Course Phần 2 - Lập trình Android nâng cao Bài 5: Tối ưu hóa hiển thị giao diện bằng Dialog và Fragment Lab 4.1 - Tạo giao diện Toast Emoji
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@ce69afad9a764c91a85e06e1f1bc4531" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Mục tiêu bài học</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@ce69afad9a764c91a85e06e1f1bc4531" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@f5db11051c684eb4bd43a2f86c99c061"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@f5db11051c684eb4bd43a2f86c99c061" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p style="text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">1. Mục ti&ecirc;u b&agrave;i học:</strong></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif">Như đ&atilde; đề cập trong phần giới thiệu, ở b&agrave;i học n&agrave;y c&aacute;c bạn sẽ được học về c&aacute;c đối tượng giao diện n&acirc;ng cao gi&uacute;p hiển thị <strong>một d&ograve;ng th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o nhanh</strong>, <strong>một cửa sổ th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o</strong>, hoặc c&oacute; thể <strong>th&aacute;o/lắp nhiều mảnh giao diện kh&aacute;c nhau c&ugrave;ng tr&ecirc;n một m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh&nbsp;chức năng</strong> được quản l&yacute; bởi Activity, cụ thể gồm:</span></span></p> <ul> <li><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;ch sử dụng đối tượng Toast để tạo ra c&aacute;c giao diện th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o nhanh ngộ nghĩnh</span></li> <li><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;ch sử dụng c&aacute;c loại Dialog để hiển thị một cửa sổ th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o tr&ecirc;n m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh giao diện</span></li> <li><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;ch sử dụng Fragment để thiết kế mảnh c&aacute;c giao diện ri&ecirc;ng biệt&nbsp;sau đ&oacute;&nbsp;&nbsp;nh&uacute;ng v&agrave;o trong một m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh giao diện chức năng gi&uacute;p t&ugrave;y biến v&agrave; tối ưu về mặt hiển thị cũng như trải nghiệm của người d&ugrave;ng</span></li> </ul> <p style="text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><b>2. Những điểm lưu &yacute; về b&agrave;i học:</b></p> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Học vi&ecirc;n cần nắm vững c&aacute;c kiến thức sau:</span></p> <ul> <li><span style="color: #000000;">Nh&uacute;ng một giao diện t&ugrave;y &yacute; v&agrave;o đối tượng Toast để hiển thị ở bất kỳ vị tr&iacute; n&agrave;o trong m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh điện thoại</span></li> <li><span style="color: #000000;">2 dạng dialog: AlertDialog &amp; Dialog với giao diện t&ugrave;y biến bởi người d&ugrave;ng</span></li> <li><span style="color: #000000;">Sử dụng Fragment bằng 2 c&aacute;ch: thẻ &lt;fragment&gt; v&agrave; nh&uacute;ng v&agrave;o layout giao diện bằng m&atilde; JAVA</span></li> <li><span style="color: #000000;">V&ograve;ng đời của Fragment</span></li> </ul> <p style="text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; margin-top: 20px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;">3. Thời gian cần thiết để học b</span>&agrave;i n&agrave;y:&nbsp;6,9 giờ (bao gồm thời lượng sinh vi&ecirc;n xem video, đọc text t&agrave;i liệu đọc, l&agrave;m lab v&agrave; quiz)</strong></p> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@a19c6e3a426548ac9f3f7ad2c7d059d0" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Tài liệu đọc: Đối tượng thông báo nhanh (Toast)</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@a19c6e3a426548ac9f3f7ad2c7d059d0" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@b76d98f92e3f48b99dced052a5c45903"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@b76d98f92e3f48b99dced052a5c45903" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 20px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Nội dung t&agrave;i liệu:</strong></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000;">T&agrave;i liệu n&agrave;y gi&uacute;p bạn nắm được định nghĩa về đối tượng Toast v&agrave; c&aacute;ch sử dụng đối tượng n&agrave;y khi muốn hiển thị một th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o l&ecirc;n m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh giao diện, cụ thể gồm:</span></p> <ul style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;">Giới thiệu về Toast</span></li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;ch khởi tạo đối tượng Toast</span></li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;ch hiển thị nhanh một nội dung l&ecirc;n m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh bằng Toast</span></li> </ul> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Link t&agrave;i liệu:</strong></p> <ul style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><a href="https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/ui/notifiers/toasts" target="_blank" style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; background: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; transition: color 0.25s ease-in-out 0s; text-decoration-line: none; color: #009fe6;">Đối tượng th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o nhanh (Toast)</a>&nbsp;<span style="color: #000000;">(xem bản dịch hỗ trợ</span> <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/19ufsyaBmolGgFiT4xbWt-yGiy3UDUk4u/view" target="_blank">tại đ&acirc;y</a>)</li> </ul> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@9ee0fd1566c646298702443b65282f3e" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Tự thiết kế một đối tượng Toast riêng (CustomToast)</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@9ee0fd1566c646298702443b65282f3e" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@a4b178d75d2e4beab3447a8817b30b6c"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@a4b178d75d2e4beab3447a8817b30b6c" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <h2 style="background-color: #0e529f; color: white; padding-top: 10px; padding-bottom: 10px; text-align: center;">2 C&Aacute;CH SỬ DỤNG TOAST</h2> <p><span style="color: #000000;"><strong>1. Toast mặc định</strong></span></p> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Sử dụng Toast trong Android rất dễ d&agrave;ng, bạn chỉ cần sử dụng một d&ograve;ng code sau l&agrave; đủ:</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;"><strong>Toast.makeText(MainActivity.this, "Hello Toast!", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();</strong></span></p> <p style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">Tuy nhi&ecirc;n, đ&oacute; l&agrave; khi ch&uacute;ng ta sử dụng Toast mặc định của Android. C&ograve;n nếu muốn hiển thị Toast c&oacute; giao diện th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o phức tạp nhiều th&igrave; ch&uacute;ng ta sẽ phải t&ugrave;y biến n&oacute;.</span></p> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Phương thức makeText d&ugrave;ng để tạo Toast, phương thức n&agrave;y trả về đối tượng Toast.</span></p> <p><span style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;c đối số trong phương thức c&oacute; &yacute; nghĩa:</span></p> <ul> <li><span style="color: #000000;"><strong>Tham số thứ nhất</strong>: L&agrave; một context</span></li> <li><span style="color: #000000;"><strong>Tham số thứ hai</strong>: L&agrave; một đoạn text bạn muốn hiển thị</span></li> <li><span style="color: #000000;"><strong>Tham số thứ ba</strong>: L&agrave; thời gian&nbsp;hiển thị Toast. Chỉ cho ph&eacute;p truyền v&agrave;o 2 gi&aacute; trị l&agrave; LENGTH_SHORT hiển thị toast trong thời gian ngắn v&agrave; LENGTH_LONG hiển thị Toast trong thời gian d&agrave;i hơn.</span></li> </ul> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Phương thức <strong>show()</strong> d&ugrave;ng để hiển thị Toast.</span></p> <p><span style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;c bạn cũng c&oacute; thể set vị tr&iacute; hiển thị Toast tr&ecirc;n m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh Android bằng phương thức <strong>setGravity</strong> v&agrave; <strong>setMargin</strong>.</span></p> <p style="padding-left: 180px;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%201.png?alt=media&amp;token=bae3359c-5bd0-4a58-b2a3-c643609594f8" alt="File preview" width="436" height="245" /></p> <p><strong>2. Toast t&ugrave;y biến</strong></p> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Toast t&ugrave;y biến (Custom) l&agrave; việc m&agrave; ch&uacute;ng ta bỏ đi View hiển thị text của Toast mặc định trong Android v&agrave; thay thế bằng một view mới của ch&uacute;ng ta.</span></p> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Việc n&agrave;y gi&uacute;p cho giao diện th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o trở n&ecirc;n sinh động hơn, ph&ugrave; hợp với c&aacute;c y&ecirc;u cầu kh&aacute;c nhau về mặt hiển thị.</span></p> <h2 style="background-color: #0e529f; color: white; padding-top: 10px; padding-bottom: 10px; text-align: center;">C&Aacute;C BƯỚC TẠO TOAST T&Ugrave;Y BIẾN</h2> <p style="font-size: 16px;"><strong>1. Tạo project v&agrave; chuẩn bị t&agrave;i nguy&ecirc;n</strong></p> <p style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">Tr&ecirc;n Android Studio tạo mới một project: File &gt; New &gt; New Project &gt; Empty Activity</span></p> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Name: <strong>CustomToast</strong></span></p> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Package name: org.funix.customtoast</span></p> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Language: Java</span></p> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Copy một icon (icon_info.png) v&agrave;o thư mục drawable của project.</span></p> <p style="padding-left: 240px;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%202.png?alt=media&amp;token=5e6d8d56-a31c-4441-85b0-aa06e6576248" alt="File preview" /></p> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Trong v&iacute; dụ n&agrave;y, ch&uacute;ng ta sẽ sử dụng "<strong>Resource Layout File</strong>" để thiết kế giao diện cho Toast.</span></p> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Nhấn phải chuột v&agrave;o thư mục "layout" v&agrave; chọn: <strong>New &gt; Layout Resource File</strong></span></p> <p style="padding-left: 90px;"><img src="https://s1.o7planning.com/vi/12635/images/63305592.png" /></p> <ul> <li><span style="color: #000000;">File name: item_toast.xml</span></li> <li><span style="color: #000000;">Root element: LinearLayout</span></li> <li><span style="color: #000000;">Source set: main</span></li> <li><span style="color: #000000;">Directory name: layout</span></li> </ul> <p style="font-size: 16px; padding-left: 180px;"><img </span><span style="color: #000000;">android.view.View</span>;<br /><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">android.widget.Button</span>;<br /><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">android.widget.ImageView</span>;<br /><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">android.widget.LinearLayout</span>;<br /><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">android.widget.TextView</span>;<br /><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">android.widget.Toast</span>;<br /><br /><span style="color: #0033b3;">public class </span><span style="color: #000000;">MainActivity </span><span style="color: #0033b3;">extends </span><span style="color: #000000;">AppCompatActivity </span>{<br /><br /> <span style="color: #0033b3;">private </span><span style="color: #000000;">Button </span><span style="color: #871094;">buttonShow</span>;<br /><br /> <span style="color: #9e880d;">@Override<br /></span><span style="color: #9e880d;"> </span><span style="color: #0033b3;">protected void </span><span style="color: #00627a;">onCreate</span>(<span style="color: #000000;">Bundle </span>savedInstanceState) {<br /> <span style="color: #0033b3;">super</span>.onCreate(savedInstanceState);<br /> setContentView(R.layout.activity_main);<br /><br /> <span style="color: #0033b3;">this</span>.<span style="color: #871094;">buttonShow </span>= (<span style="color: #000000;">Button</span>) <span style="color: #0033b3;">this</span>.findViewById(R.id.button_show);<br /> <span style="color: #0033b3;">this</span>.<span style="color: #871094;">buttonShow</span>.setOnClickListener(<span style="color: #0033b3;">new </span><span style="color: #000000;">View</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">OnClickListener</span>() {<br /> <span style="color: #9e880d;">@Override<br /></span><span style="color: #9e880d;"> </span><span style="color: #0033b3;">public void </span><span style="color: #00627a;">onClick</span>(<span style="color: #000000;">View </span>v) {<br /> <strong>buttonShowClicked();</strong><br /> }<br /> });<br /> }<br /><br /> <span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">// Tạo Toast với layout t&ugrave;y biến<br /></span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;"> </span><span style="color: #0033b3;">private void </span><span style="color: #00627a;">buttonShowClicked</span>() {<br /> <span style="color: #000000;">LayoutInflater inflater </span>= <span style="color: #0033b3;">this</span>.getLayoutInflater();<br /><span style="font-size: 10.5pt;"> </span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">// lấy layout từ thư mục res/layout/item_toast.xml ra m&ocirc;i trường code.<br /></span> <span style="color: #000000;">View layout </span>= <span style="color: #000000;">inflater</span>.inflate(<strong>R.layout.item_toast</strong>, <span style="color: #0033b3;">null</span>);<br /> <span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">// &Aacute;nh xạ c&aacute;c đối tượng giao diện con ra để đổi dữ liệu<br /></span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;"> </span><span style="color: #000000;">TextView textView </span>= (<span style="color: #000000;">TextView</span>) <span style="color: #000000;">layout</span>.findViewById(R.id.textView);<br /> <span style="color: #000000;">textView</span>.setText(<span style="color: #067d17;">"This is a message"</span>);<br /> <span style="color: #000000;">textView</span>.setTextColor(<span style="color: #000000;">Color</span>.<span style="color: #871094; font-style: italic;">BLUE</span>);<br /><br /> <span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">// Tạo một Toast t&ugrave;y biến<br /></span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;"> </span><span style="color: #000000;">Toast toast </span>= <span style="color: #0033b3;">new </span>Toast(<span style="color: #0033b3;">this</span>);<br /> <span style="color: #000000;">toast</span>.setDuration(<span style="color: #000000;">Toast</span>.<span style="color: #871094; font-style: italic;">LENGTH_LONG</span>);<br /> <span style="color: #000000;">toast</span>.setView(<span style="color: #000000;">layout</span>);<br /> <span style="color: #000000;">toast</span>.show();<br /> }<br />}</pre> <pre style="padding-left: 150px;"><span style="color: #3c3c3c; font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; white-space: normal;"><span style="color: #000000;">Đ&acirc;y l&agrave; th&agrave;nh quả!<br /></span><span face="Open Sans, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="white-space: normal;"><br /><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%206.gif?alt=media&amp;token=65fe86af-7f9e-452a-b993-a350afcd0f11" alt="File preview" /><br /><br /></span></span><strong>Ch&uacute; &yacute;:<span face="Open Sans, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="white-space: normal;">&nbsp;</span></span></strong><span style="color: #ff0000;"><strong style="color: #3c3c3c; font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; white-space: normal;">LayoutInflate</strong></span><span face="Open Sans, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="white-space: normal;"> l&agrave; 1 đối tượng cho ph&eacute;p &aacute;nh xạ một layout giao diện được x&acirc;y dựng trong thư mục</span></span><span face="Open Sans, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="white-space: normal;">&nbsp;</span></span><strong style="color: #3c3c3c; font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; white-space: normal;">res/layout </strong><span face="Open Sans, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="white-space: normal;"><span style="white-space: normal;">ra m&ocirc;i trường code để sử dụng.</span></span><span style="white-space: normal;"><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><br /></span></span></span></span></pre> <hr /> <p style="font-size: 16px;">H&atilde;y xem to&agrave;n bộ video b&agrave;i giảng sau đ&acirc;y để hiểu r&otilde; hơn&nbsp;về Toast!</p> <p style="font-size: 16px;"></p> <div style="background-image: url('https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPicture%20for%20courses%2Fbackground_Video.jpg?alt=media&amp;token=0ae7f287-f72f-496d-b18f-da9d02798468'); 150px; border-radius: 50%; border: 10px solid #FEDE00;" /> <h1 style="font-size: 40px; color: white; margin: 10px; text-align: center;">Tự thiết kế một đối tượng Toast ri&ecirc;ng (CustomToast)</h1> <p style="font-size: 30px; color: white; text-align: center;"><em>Video từ nguồn học liệu gốc</em></p> <p style="font-size: 20px; color: #1f9afe; text-align: center;">Credit:&nbsp;<a margin-top: 20px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Nội dung t&agrave;i liệu:</strong></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000;">T&agrave;i liệu n&agrave;y gi&uacute;p bạn&nbsp;nắm được c&aacute;c kiến thức về cửa sổ th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o Dialog, cụ thể gồm:</span></p> <ul style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000;">Kh&aacute;i niệm về Dialog</span></li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000;">C&aacute;c dạng Dialog được sử dụng</span></li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000;">C&aacute;ch sử dụng Dialog để hiển thị cửa sổ th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o trong c&aacute;c ho&agrave;n cảnh kh&aacute;c nhau</span></li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000;">C&aacute;ch t&ugrave;y biến một dialog với giao diện được tạo từ người d&ugrave;ng</span></li> </ul> <p><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Link t&agrave;i liệu:</strong></p> <ul style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><a href="https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/ui/dialogs" target="_blank" style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; background: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; transition: color 0.25s ease-in-out 0s; text-decoration-line: none; color: #009fe6;">Cửa sổ th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o (Dialog)</a><span style="color: #000000;">&nbsp;(xem bản dịch hỗ trợ</span> <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/19vZuCUSW6eON0T_Lgy-09syPk7l5bISi/view" target="_blank">tại đ&acirc;y</a>)</li> </ul> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@4952be86c695426583231e7527d8a3d1" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Giới thiệu về đối tượng Fragment giúp hiển thị giao diện tối ưu</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@4952be86c695426583231e7527d8a3d1" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@4aa9c0e7ff5849aeb99f9ef252d6719b"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@4aa9c0e7ff5849aeb99f9ef252d6719b" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <h2 style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 30px 40px 15px 0px; padding: 10px 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 1.2em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: white; letter-spacing: 1px; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; background-color: #0e529f; text-align: center;">FRAGMENT L&Agrave; G&Igrave;?</h2> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Fragment c&oacute; thể hiểu l&agrave; một Activity thu nhỏ (Sub Activity) gi&uacute;p hiển thị một giao diện chức năng v&agrave; quản l&yacute; c&aacute;c trạng th&aacute;i cũng như c&aacute;c tương t&aacute;c của người d&ugrave;ng tr&ecirc;n giao diện.</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Bằng c&aacute;ch sử dụng c&aacute;c fragment, ch&uacute;ng ta c&oacute; thể tạo ra một thiết kế UI linh hoạt, c&oacute; thể được điều chỉnh dựa tr&ecirc;n k&iacute;ch thước m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh của thiết bị như m&aacute;y t&iacute;nh bảng, điện thoại th&ocirc;ng minh.</span></p> <p><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%207.png?alt=media&amp;token=2a8d5e27-2039-4001-b2e2-7e98174fd9c2" alt="File preview" /></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Fragment trong Android phải được đưa v&agrave;o một activity do v&ograve;ng đời của fragment đ&oacute; sẽ lu&ocirc;n lu&ocirc;n bị ảnh hưởng bởi v&ograve;ng đời của activity. Trong trường hợp nếu ch&uacute;ng ta tạm dừng một activity th&igrave; tất cả c&aacute;c fragment li&ecirc;n quan đến activity đ&oacute; cũng sẽ bị dừng lại.</span></span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Trong Android, c&oacute; thể ch&egrave;n fragment v&agrave;o bố cục activity bằng c&aacute;ch sử dụng phần tử &lt;fragment&gt; v&agrave; chia bố cục của activity th&agrave;nh c&aacute;c fragment. Ta c&oacute; thể sửa đổi giao diện của thiết kế ứng dụng khi chạy v&agrave; cũng c&oacute; thể thực hiện một fragment m&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng c&oacute; bất kỳ giao diện người d&ugrave;ng (UI) n&agrave;o.</span></span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">C&oacute; thể chọn sử dụng hoặc kh&ocirc;ng sử dụng c&aacute;c fragment v&agrave;o activity. Nhưng nếu sử dụng, n&oacute; sẽ cải thiện t&iacute;nh linh hoạt của giao diện người d&ugrave;ng ứng dụng v&agrave; gi&uacute;p điều chỉnh thiết kế ứng dụng dựa tr&ecirc;n k&iacute;ch thước thiết bị dễ d&agrave;ng hơn.</span></span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Đ&acirc;y v&iacute; dụ về sự kh&aacute;c nhau khi thiết kế nhiều fragment trong một activity để hiển thị chi tiết của một mục tr&ecirc;n thiết bị m&aacute;y t&iacute;nh bảng v&agrave; tr&ecirc;n thiết bị di động.</span></span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 90px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%208.png?alt=media&amp;token=c66acce4-e77c-4f02-8ed1-99acd1124d47" alt="File preview" /></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Nếu bạn quan s&aacute;t v&iacute; dụ tr&ecirc;n cho m&aacute;y t&iacute;nh bảng, ch&uacute;ng ta đ&atilde; x&aacute;c định activity A c&oacute; hai fragment. Fragment đầu ti&ecirc;n l&agrave; hiển thị danh s&aacute;ch c&aacute;c mục v&agrave; fragment thứ hai l&agrave; hiển thị chi tiết về mục m&agrave; ch&uacute;ng ta đ&atilde; chọn trong fragment đầu ti&ecirc;n.</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Đối với thiết bị cầm tay k&iacute;ch thước nhỏ th&igrave; sẽ kh&ocirc;ng c&oacute; đủ kh&ocirc;ng gian để hiển thị cả c&aacute;c fragment trong một activity. V&igrave; vậy, activity A bao gồm fragment đầu ti&ecirc;n để hiển thị danh s&aacute;ch c&aacute;c mục v&agrave; activity B bao gồm một fragment kh&aacute;c để hiển thị chi tiết của một mục được chọn trong activity A .</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><strong>V&iacute; dụ:</strong> </span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">App GMAIL được thiết kế với nhiều fragment, do đ&oacute; thiết kế của n&oacute; sẽ được thay đổi dựa tr&ecirc;n k&iacute;ch thước của thiết bị như m&aacute;y t&iacute;nh bảng hoặc thiết bị di động.</span></p> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Trong giao diện tablet tr&ecirc;n, ch&uacute;ng ta c&oacute; thể hiển thị cả 2 fragment&nbsp;</span><span style="color: #000000;">tr&ecirc;n m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh</span><span style="color: #000000;">&nbsp;</span><span style="color: #000000; font-size: 1em;">v&igrave; giao diện lớn.</span></p> <p><span style="color: #000000; font-size: 1em;">C&ograve;n đối với giao diện mobile dưới đ&acirc;y, tại một thời điểm chỉ c&oacute; thể hiển thị được một fragment v&agrave;o trong Activity v&igrave; giao diện nhỏ.</span></p> <p style="padding-left: 90px;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%209.png?alt=media&amp;token=75a68ff7-ce24-47a9-96f8-fd30f471649d" alt="File preview" /></p> <h2 style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 30px 40px 15px 0px; padding: 10px 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 1.2em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: white; letter-spacing: 1px; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; background-color: #0e529f; text-align: center;">C&Aacute;C LỚP CON CỦA FRAGMENT</h2> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Fragment l&agrave; lớp mạnh mẽ theo c&aacute;ch thức ri&ecirc;ng của n&oacute; nhưng&nbsp;n&oacute;&nbsp;sẽ kh&ocirc;ng thể ph&aacute;t huy được hết tiềm năng m&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng được mở rộng để phục vụ mục đ&iacute;ch của ứng dụng.&nbsp;</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Ch&iacute;nh v&igrave; vậy, Google đ&atilde; cung cấp rất nhiều c&aacute;c lớp con kh&aacute;c nhau của Fragment để gi&uacute;p c&aacute;c nh&agrave; ph&aacute;t triển nhanh ch&oacute;ng x&acirc;y dựng c&aacute;c ứng dụng như &yacute; muốn. C&oacute; một số Fragment kh&aacute; hữu &iacute;ch trong qu&aacute; tr&igrave;nh x&acirc;y dựng c&aacute;c ứng dụng như:</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><strong>1. ListFragment</strong>: Fragment n&agrave;y c&oacute; t&iacute;ch hợp một ListView b&ecirc;n trong v&agrave; một số phương thức trợ gi&uacute;p để l&agrave;m cho th&agrave;nh phần n&agrave;y nổi bật, chẳng hạn như một ProgressBar kh&ocirc;ng x&aacute;c định (một v&ograve;ng tr&ograve;n, quay li&ecirc;n tục) v&agrave; TextView để hiển thị văn bản khi List rỗng.</span></p> <p style="padding-left: 240px;"><br /><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%2011.png?alt=media&amp;token=2d8dc38b-3736-4091-a1fe-d198a2a1b366" alt="File preview" width="389" height="677" /></p> <p><span style="color: #000000;"><strong>2. MapFragment</strong>: Đ&acirc;y l&agrave; một Fragment rất c&oacute; gi&aacute; trị, g&oacute;i trong n&oacute; một MapView để sử dụng với c&aacute;c dịch vụ Google Maps. Thay v&igrave; phải tự m&igrave;nh viết tất cả c&aacute;c code, bạn c&oacute; thể thừa kế Fragment n&agrave;y để th&ecirc;m chức năng bản đồ cơ bản v&agrave;o ứng dụng của bạn.</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 180px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%2012.png?alt=media&amp;token=0174c64b-14a3-47c9-9592-a92fe2b86fc8" alt="File preview" width="445" height="791" /></p> <hr style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; box-sizing: content-box; height: 0px; line-height: 1.4em; color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;" /> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;">H&atilde;y xem to&agrave;n bộ video b&agrave;i giảng sau đ&acirc;y để hiểu r&otilde; hơn&nbsp;về Fragment!</span></p> <div style="background-image: url('https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPicture%20for%20courses%2Fbackground_Video.jpg?alt=media&amp;token=0ae7f287-f72f-496d-b18f-da9d02798468'); background-size: cover; height: 480px; padding-top: 80px; text-align: center; cursor: pointer;" onclick="window.open('https://www.udemy.com/course/ultimate-android-lollipop-app-development-course/learn/lecture/2279408?start=0','mywindow');"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPicture%20for%20courses%2Fplayer_Video.png?alt=media&amp;token=98c3b4ec-62ef-4f07-814d-f4dc052f8bfc" style="height: 150px; border-radius: 50%; border: 10px solid #FEDE00;" /> <h1 style="font-size: 40px; color: white; margin: 10px; text-align: center;">Giới thiệu về đối tượng Fragment gi&uacute;p hiển thị giao diện tối ưu</h1> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 30px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: white; text-align: center;"><em style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Video từ nguồn học liệu gốc</em></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: #1f9afe; text-align: center;">Credit:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.udemy.com" target="_blank" style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; background: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; transition: color 0.25s ease-in-out 0s; text-decoration-line: none; color: #009fe6;">Udemy</a></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><em style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Bạn h&atilde;y ch&uacute; &yacute; bật phụ đề tiếng Việt được đ&oacute;ng g&oacute;p bởi FUNiX để hiểu r&otilde; hơn.</em></p> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@ac53cd674bb14dcc9439895d7ba9124f" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Vòng đời của Fragment (Fragment Lifecycle)</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@ac53cd674bb14dcc9439895d7ba9124f" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@b77e9107b2b040ab916d4f5eb4f5db16"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@b77e9107b2b040ab916d4f5eb4f5db16" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <h2 style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 30px 40px 15px 0px; padding: 10px 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 1.2em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: white; letter-spacing: 1px; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; background-color: #0e529f; text-align: center;">V&Ograve;NG ĐỜI CỦA FRAGMENT</h2> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Như đ&atilde; ph&acirc;n t&iacute;ch ở b&agrave;i học trước, Fragment l&agrave; một th&agrave;nh phần android độc lập, được sử dụng bởi một activity giống như một sub-activity. Fragment c&oacute; v&ograve;ng đời v&agrave; giao diện ri&ecirc;ng. C&aacute;c Fragment thường c&oacute; một file java đi k&egrave;m với file giao diện xml. C&aacute;c fragment kh&ocirc;ng c&oacute; file giao diện xml thường được gọi l&agrave; headless fragments.</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Fragment sử dụng phương thức getActivity() để lấy ra Activity cha.</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Fragment được định nghĩa trong file xml của activity<strong> (static definition - định nghĩa tĩnh</strong>) hoặc c&oacute; thể sửa đổi fragment khi đang chạy <strong>(dynamic definition - định nghĩa động)</strong>.</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 240px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%2013.png?alt=media&amp;token=77cad89c-f86a-4b8c-9f6c-98b6fffdaa94" alt="File preview" /></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Sau đ&acirc;y l&agrave; danh s&aacute;ch c&aacute;c phương thức sẽ thực hiện trong v&ograve;ng đời của fragment trong Android.</span></span></p> <table style="margin-bottom: 20px; margin-top: 0px; border-spacing: 0px; width: 923px; color: #000000; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17.5px;" height="419"> <thead> <tr style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><th style="color: #40454d; background-color: #f8f8f8; padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Phương thức</span></p> </th><th style="color: #40454d; background-color: #f8f8f8; padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">M&ocirc; tả</span></p> </th></tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">onAttach ()</span></p> </td> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Được gọi khi fragment đ&atilde; được li&ecirc;n kết với một activity.</span></p> </td> </tr> <tr> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">onCreate ()</span></p> </td> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Được sử dụng để khởi tạo fragment.</span></p> </td> </tr> <tr style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">onCreateView()</span></p> </td> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Được sử dụng để tạo fragment view.</span></p> </td> </tr> <tr> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">onActivityCreated ()</span></p> </td> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Được gọi khi fragment v&agrave; view của fragment được khởi tạo, d&ugrave;ng để ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh nốt c&ocirc;ng đoạn khởi tạo fragment v&agrave; activity</span></p> </td> </tr> <tr style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">onStart()</span></p> </td> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Được gọi để hiển thị fragment.</span></p> </td> </tr> <tr> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">onResume ()</span></p> </td> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Flagment hoạt động ho&agrave;n to&agrave;n trong activity.</span></p> </td> </tr> <tr style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">onPause ()</span></p> </td> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Được gọi khi fragment kh&ocirc;ng c&ograve;n hiển thị v&agrave; người d&ugrave;ng đang rời khỏi fragment.</span></p> </td> </tr> <tr> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">onStop ()</span></p> </td> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Được gọi để dừng fragment.</span></p> </td> </tr> <tr style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">onDestroyView ()</span></p> </td> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Giao diện view fragment bị x&oacute;a sau khi thực hiện.</span></p> </td> </tr> <tr> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">onDestroy ()</span></p> </td> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Được gọi khi hủy fragment.</span></p> </td> </tr> <tr style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">onDetach ()</span></p> </td> <td style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; border-color: #e5e5e5;"> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Được gọi ngay sau khi fragment bị t&aacute;ch ra khỏi activity.</span></p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p><span style="color: #000000;">&Yacute; nghĩa v&agrave; c&aacute;ch hoạt động của c&aacute;c h&agrave;nh vi trong Fragment th&igrave; gần giống Activity. Tuy nhi&ecirc;n, lưu &yacute; rằng Fragment sống dựa v&agrave;o Context của Activity, do đ&oacute; phương thức&nbsp;onAttach()&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 1em;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">c</span>h&iacute;nh l&agrave; nơi Context được khởi tạo v&agrave; cho ph&eacute;p sử dụng tại m&ocirc;i trường Fragment.<br /></span></span></p> <hr style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; box-sizing: content-box; height: 0px; line-height: 1.4em; color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;" /> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;">H&atilde;y xem to&agrave;n bộ video b&agrave;i giảng sau đ&acirc;y để hiểu r&otilde; hơn&nbsp;về v&ograve;ng đời của Fragment!</span></p> <div style="background-image: url('https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPicture%20for%20courses%2Fbackground_Video.jpg?alt=media&amp;token=0ae7f287-f72f-496d-b18f-da9d02798468'); background-size: cover; height: 480px; padding-top: 80px; text-align: center; cursor: pointer;" onclick="window.open('https://www.udemy.com/course/ultimate-android-lollipop-app-development-course/learn/lecture/2279412?start=0','mywindow');"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPicture%20for%20courses%2Fplayer_Video.png?alt=media&amp;token=98c3b4ec-62ef-4f07-814d-f4dc052f8bfc" style="height: 150px; border-radius: 50%; border: 10px solid #FEDE00;" /> <h1 style="font-size: 40px; color: white; margin: 10px; text-align: center;">V&ograve;ng đời của Fragment (Fragment Lifecycle)</h1> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 30px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: white; text-align: center;"><em style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant: inherit; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: #1f9afe; text-align: center;">Credit:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.udemy.com" target="_blank" style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; background: transparent; margin: 0px; transition: color 0.25s ease-in-out 0s; text-decoration-line: none; color: #009fe6;">Udemy</a></p> </div> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><em style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Bạn h&atilde;y ch&uacute; &yacute; bật phụ đề tiếng Việt được đ&oacute;ng g&oacute;p bởi FUNiX để hiểu r&otilde; hơn.</em></p> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@d81ef783a32c4f7988ef21af235d2aed" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Cách sử dụng Fragment - phần 1</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@d81ef783a32c4f7988ef21af235d2aed" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@df50b369b4fd48108e5eb9d0bc9861b5"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@df50b369b4fd48108e5eb9d0bc9861b5" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <h2 style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 30px 40px 15px 0px; padding: 10px 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 1.2em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: white; letter-spacing: 1px; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; background-color: #0e529f; text-align: center;">STATIC FRAGMENT</h2> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Static Fragment l&agrave; kiểu fragment được khai b&aacute;o (định nghĩa) trực tiếp trong file <strong>activity_main.xml</strong></span></p> <p><span style="color: #000000;">V&iacute; dụ mẫu:</span></p> <p><span style="color: #000000;">Trong file <strong>activity_main.xml</strong> khai b&aacute;o tĩnh:</span></p> <pre style="color: #080808; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 10.5pt;"><span style="font-style: italic;">&lt;?</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">xml version</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="1.0" </span><span style="color: #174ad4;">encoding</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="utf-8"</span><span style="font-style: italic;">?&gt;<br /></span>&lt;<span style="color: #0033b3;">LinearLayout </span><span style="color: #174ad4;">xmlns:</span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #174ad4;">xmlns:</span><span style="color: #871094;">tools</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="http://schemas.android.com/tools"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_width</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="match_parent"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_height</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="match_parent"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:gravity</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="center|top"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">tools</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:context</span><span style="color: #067d17;">=".MainActivity"</span>&gt;<br /><br /> &lt;<span style="color: #0033b3;">fragment<br /></span><span style="color: #0033b3;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:id</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="@+id/listFragment"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_weight</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="1"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_width</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="0dp"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_height</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="match_parent"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #174ad4;">class</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="com.example.funix.MyFragment1"</span>&gt;<br /> &lt;/<span style="color: #0033b3;">fragment</span>&gt;<br />&lt;/<span style="color: #0033b3;">LinearLayout</span>&gt;</pre> <p><span style="color: #000000; font-family: Consolas, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; white-space: pre; background-color: #f7f7f7;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; white-space: normal; background-color: #ffffff;">Ta thấy MyFragment1 đ&atilde; được nh&uacute;ng v&agrave;o trong file&nbsp;</span><strong style="color: #3c3c3c; font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; white-space: normal; background-color: #ffffff;">activity_main.xml</strong><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; white-space: normal; background-color: #ffffff;">&nbsp;bằng thẻ &lt;fragment&gt;.</span></span></p> <h2 style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 30px 40px 15px 0px; padding: 10px 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 1.2em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: white; letter-spacing: 1px; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; background-color: #0e529f; text-align: center;">V&Iacute; DỤ SỬ DỤNG STATIC FRAGMENT</h2> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">V&iacute; dụ, ta c&oacute; 2 static fragment l&agrave; MyFragment1.java v&agrave; MyFragment2.java. Trong đ&oacute;:&nbsp;</span></p> <ul> <li><span style="color: #000000;"><strong style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">MyFragment1</strong><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;"> quản l&yacute; giao diện fragment1.xml</span></span></li> <li><span style="color: #000000;"><strong style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">MyFragment2</strong><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;"> quản l&yacute; giao diện fragment1.xml</span></span></li> </ul> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #000000;">1. File res/layout/fragment1.xml c&oacute; nội dung sau:</span></strong></p> <pre style="color: #080808; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 10.5pt;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-style: italic;">&lt;?</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">xml version</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="1.0" </span><span style="color: #174ad4;">encoding</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="utf-8"</span><span style="font-style: italic;">?&gt;<br /></span>&lt;<span style="color: #0033b3;">LinearLayout </span><span style="color: #174ad4;">xmlns:</span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_height</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="match_parent"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:orientation</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="vertical"</span>&gt;</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> &lt;<span style="color: #0033b3;">TextView<br /></span><span style="color: #0033b3;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span <strong>MyFragment1</strong> để quản l&yacute; giao diện fragment1.xml</span></p> <pre style="color: #080808; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 10.5pt;"><span style="font-family: tr&igrave;nh, ta sẽ được kết quả như sau:</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 240px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; sans-serif;" /> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit;
