#000000;">H&atilde;y xem to&agrave;n bộ video b&agrave;i giảng sau đ&acirc;y để hiểu r&otilde; hơn&nbsp;về c&aacute;ch sử dụng Fragment!</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;">Ch&uacute; &yacute;, trong video c&oacute; hướng dẫn viết code v&agrave;o phương thức onActivityCreate (12 ph&uacute;t 48 gi&acirc;y), h</span>&atilde;y thay thế bằng phương thức:&nbsp;</p> <pre style="color: #000000; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 13.5pt;"><span style="color: #808000;">@Override<br /></span><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">public void </span>onViewCreated(<span style="color: #808000;">@NonNull </span>View view, <span style="color: #808000;">@Nullable </span>Bundle savedInstanceState) {<br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">super</span>.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);<br /> //Nội dung phương thức<br />}</pre> <div style="background-image: type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <h2 style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 30px 40px 15px 0px; padding: 10px 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 1.2em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: white; letter-spacing: 1px; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; background-color: #0e529f; text-align: center;">DYNAMIC FRAGMENT</h2> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Nếu như với c&aacute;ch hiển thị tĩnh tr&ecirc;n kia, bạn phải chỉ định thẻ &lt;fragment&gt; n&agrave;o sẽ chứa đựng Fragment n&agrave;o một c&aacute;ch cố định&nbsp;th&igrave; với c&aacute;ch hiển thị động n&agrave;y, bạn chỉ cần khai b&aacute;o một v&ugrave;ng kh&ocirc;ng gian n&agrave;o đ&oacute; sẽ chứa đựng Fragment.</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">V&iacute; dụ: Sửa lại file main_activity.xml ở b&agrave;i học trước như sau:</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-style: italic;">&lt;?</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">xml version</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="1.0" </span><span style="color: #174ad4;">encoding</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="utf-8"</span><span style="font-style: italic;">?&gt;</span></span></p> <pre style="color: #080808; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 10.5pt;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">&lt;<span style="color: #0033b3;">LinearLayout </span><span style="color: #174ad4;">xmlns:</span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_width</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="match_parent"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:padding</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="20dp"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_height</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="match_parent"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:orientation</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="vertical"</span>&gt;</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> &lt;<span style="color: #0033b3;">Button<br /></span><span style="color: #0033b3;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:id</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="@+id/btn_add"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_width</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="wrap_content"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_height</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="wrap_content"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:text</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="Add fragment" </span>/&gt;</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> &lt;<span style="color: #0033b3;">FrameLayout<br /></span><span style="color: #0033b3;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_marginTop</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="10dp"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:id</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="@+id/frame_layout"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:background</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="@color/purple_200"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_width</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="match_parent"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_height</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="0dp"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_weight</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="1" </span>/&gt;</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">&lt;/<span style="color: #0033b3;">LinearLayout</span>&gt;</span></pre> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Giao diện của layout main tạm thời sẽ hiển thị như sau:</span></p> <p style="padding-left: 210px;"><img Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Tiếp tục sửa trong file MainActivity như sau v&agrave; thực thi lại chương tr&igrave;nh!</span></span></p> <pre style="color: #080808; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 10.5pt;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">package </span><span style="color: #000000;">com.funix.fragment</span>;</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">android.os.Bundle</span>;</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">android.view.View</span>;</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity</span>;</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">androidx.fragment.app.FragmentManager</span>;</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">androidx.fragment.app.FragmentTransaction</span>;</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">public class </span><span style="color: #000000;">MainActivity </span><span style="color: #0033b3;">extends </span><span style="color: #000000;">AppCompatActivity </span>{</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #9e880d;">@Override<br /></span><span style="color: #9e880d;"> </span><span style="color: #0033b3;">protected void </span><span style="color: #00627a;">onCreate</span>(<span style="color: #000000;">Bundle </span>savedInstanceState) {</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #0033b3;">super</span>.onCreate(savedInstanceState);</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> setContentView(<span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">layout</span>.<span style="color: #871094; font-style: italic;">activity_main</span>);</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">//X</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">ử</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;"> l&yacute; click đ</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">ể</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;"> nh&uacute;ng MyFragment1 v&agrave;o giao di</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">ệ</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">n main<br /></span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;"> </span>findViewById(<span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">id</span>.<span style="color: #871094; font-style: italic;">btn_add</span>).setOnClickListener(<span style="color: #0033b3;">new </span><span style="color: #000000;">View</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">OnClickListener</span>() {</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #9e880d;">@Override<br /></span><span style="color: #9e880d;"> </span><span style="color: #0033b3;">public void </span><span style="color: #00627a;">onClick</span>(<span style="color: #000000;">View </span>v) {</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> addFragment1();</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> }</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> });</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> }</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #0033b3;">private void </span><span style="color: #00627a;">addFragment1</span>() {</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><strong> <span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">//S</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">ử</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;"> d</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">ụ</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">ng tr&igrave;nh qu</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">ả</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">n l&yacute; c&aacute;c Fragment<br /></span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;"> </span><span style="color: #000000;">FragmentManager fm </span>= getSupportFragmentManager();</strong></span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><strong> <span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">//T</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">ạ</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">o m</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">ộ</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">t phi&ecirc;n l&agrave;m vi</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">ệ</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">c<br /></span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;"> </span><span style="color: #000000;">FragmentTransaction ftAdd </span>= <span style="color: #000000;">fm</span>.beginTransaction();</strong></span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><strong> <span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">//Th</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">ự</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">c hi</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">ệ</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">n nh&uacute;ng Fragment v&agrave;o giao kh&ocirc;ng gian c</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">ủ</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">a FrameLayout c&oacute; id frame_layout<br /></span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;"> </span><span style="color: #000000;">ftAdd</span>.add(<span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">id</span>.<span style="color: #871094; font-style: italic;">frame_layout</span>, <span style="color: #0033b3;">new </span>MyFragment1());</strong></span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><strong> <span style="color: #000000;">ftAdd</span>.commit();</strong></span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> }</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">}</span></pre> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Khi click v&agrave;o Button, giao diện chương tr&igrave;nh được hiển thị như sau:</span></span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 240px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%2016.png?alt=media&amp;token=6f796544-f958-44d9-9bfc-5c6219570388" alt="File preview" /><br /></span></span></p> <h2 style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 30px 40px 15px 0px; padding: 10px 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 1.2em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: white; letter-spacing: 1px; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; background-color: #0e529f; text-align: center;"><span color="#ffffff" face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="color: #ffffff; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 19.2px; letter-spacing: 1px;">QUẢN L&Yacute; FRAGMENT</span></span></h2> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">1. FragmentManager&nbsp;</span></strong></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 30px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Đ&acirc;y l&agrave; một lớp d&ugrave;ng để quản l&yacute; c&aacute;c <strong>Fragment</strong>. Lớp n&agrave;y được t&iacute;ch hợp v&agrave;o trong mỗi <strong>Activity</strong> để gi&uacute;p c&aacute;c Activity c&oacute; thể dễ d&agrave;ng th&ecirc;m (<strong>add</strong>), x&oacute;a (<strong>remove</strong>) hoặc thay thế (<strong>replace</strong>) c&aacute;c <strong>Fragment</strong> ra khỏi một v&ugrave;ng kh&ocirc;ng gian một c&aacute;ch linh động.</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">C&oacute; hai lớp <strong>FragmentManager</strong> m&agrave; bạn c&oacute; thể c&acirc;n nhắc sử dụng:</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%2017.png?alt=media&amp;token=14f4649e-0461-4430-b4f6-725b5bdbb0d3" alt="File preview" /></p> <ul> <li> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><strong>FragmentManager</strong> ở g&oacute;i android.app, được gọi th&ocirc;ng qua phương thức *getFragmentManager() *của Activity sử dụng khi project của bạn khai b&aacute;o minSdkVersion lớn hơn 11.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><strong>FragmentManager</strong> ở g&oacute;i android.support.v4.app, được gọi th&ocirc;ng qua phương thức getSupportFragmentManager() của Activity. Nếu project của bạn khai b&aacute;o minSdkVersion nhỏ hơn 11 th&igrave; bạn buộc phải d&ugrave;ng lớp quản l&yacute; n&agrave;y để c&oacute; thể mang Fragment đến với c&aacute;c hệ điều h&agrave;nh trước Android 3.0.</span></p> </li> </ul> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 30px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;">Lớp n&agrave;y c&oacute; một phương thức rất hữu dụng đ&oacute; l&agrave;: <strong>findFragmentById()</strong></span></p> <p style="padding-left: 30px;"><span style="color: #000000;">findFragmentById(): khi d&ugrave;ng phương thức n&agrave;y, bạn sẽ truyền v&agrave;o cho n&oacute; một ID. ID n&agrave;y c&oacute; thể l&agrave; ID của thẻ fragment như với mục hiển thị tĩnh hoặc ID của Layout chứa Fragment như v&iacute; dụ tạo Fragment động như tr&ecirc;n. Kết quả của phương thức n&agrave;y sẽ trả về cho bạn một Fragment được chứa trong layout c&oacute; ID m&agrave; bạn vừa cung cấp.</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;"><strong><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">2. FragmentTransaction</span></strong></span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">K</span><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">hi đ&atilde; c&oacute; FragmentManager, bạn bắt đầu thực hiện việc th&ecirc;m, x&oacute;a, thay đổi thoải m&aacute;i c&aacute;c Fragment dựa v&agrave;o FragmentTransaction n&agrave;y. Bạn c&oacute; thể gọi FragmentTransaction th&ocirc;ng qua phương thức beginTransaction() từ FragmentManager.</span></span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #000000;">FragmentTransaction c&oacute; c&aacute;c phương thức th&uacute; vị để bạn quản l&yacute; c&aacute;c Fragment như sau:</span></p> <ul> <li> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><strong>add</strong>(): khi FrameLayout c&ograve;n rỗng, tức chưa chứa đựng bất kỳ Fragment n&agrave;o, th&igrave; bạn c&oacute; thể d&ugrave;ng phương thức n&agrave;y để add Fragment v&agrave;o cho FrameLayout đ&oacute;. Như bạn sắp l&agrave;m quen với code add một FirstFragment sau đ&acirc;y.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><strong>replace</strong>(): khi bạn muốn thay thế một Fragment đang c&oacute; sẵn ở FrameLayout bằng một Fragment n&agrave;o đ&oacute; kh&aacute;c.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><strong>remove</strong>(): khi bạn muốn gỡ bỏ Fragment ra khỏi một FrameLayout n&agrave;o đ&oacute;.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><strong>addToBackStack</strong>(): khi bạn quản l&yacute; Fragment bởi c&aacute;c phương thức replace() hay remove() tr&ecirc;n đ&acirc;y, bạn c&oacute; thể sử dụng th&ecirc;m phương thức addToBackStack() n&agrave;y. Nếu bạn gọi đến phương thức n&agrave;y trước khi gọi commit() sẽ được n&oacute;i ở dưới th&igrave; hệ thống sẽ đưa Fragment ở transaction hiện tại v&agrave;o Back Stack. Điều n&agrave;y c&oacute; &yacute; nghĩa l&agrave;, Fragment bị thay thế hay bị gỡ ra khỏi Layout ở transaction n&agrave;y sẽ kh&ocirc;ng bị x&oacute;a khỏi hệ thống m&agrave; vẫn c&ograve;n được quản l&yacute; b&ecirc;n trong Back Stack. V&agrave; do Fragment kh&ocirc;ng bị hủy khỏi Back Stack n&ecirc;n nếu user nhấn n&uacute;t back sau đ&oacute;, họ ho&agrave;n to&agrave;n c&oacute; thể quay trở lại với Fragment trước đ&oacute; đ&atilde; bị gỡ ra.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><strong>commit</strong>(): cho d&ugrave; bạn c&oacute; quản l&yacute; hiển thị Fragment bằng add(), replace() hay remove() th&igrave; bạn cũng phải gọi commit() cuối c&ugrave;ng để FragmentTransaction biết sẽ bắt đầu thực hiện c&aacute;c transaction m&agrave; bạn đ&atilde; ra lệnh đ&oacute;.</span></p> </li> </ul> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Đoạn code mẫu về việc sử dụng FragmentManager v&agrave; FragmentTransaction:</span></p> <p><span style="color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">FragmentManager fm = getSupportFragmentManager();</span></p> <pre style="color: #080808; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 10.5pt;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">// add (Nh&uacute;ng th&ecirc;m 1 fragment mới, đ&egrave; l&ecirc;n fragment cũ)<br /></span><span style="color: #000000;">FragmentTransaction ft_add </span>= <span style="color: #000000;">fm</span>.beginTransaction();</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000000;">ft_add</span>.add(<span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">id</span>.<span style="color: #871094; font-style: italic;">frame_layout</span>, <span style="color: #0033b3;">new </span>MyFragment1());</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000000;">ft_add</span>.commit();</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">// replace (Thay thế fragment hiện tại bằng 1 fragment mới)<br /></span><span style="color: #000000;">FragmentTransaction ft_rep </span>= <span style="color: #000000;">fm</span>.beginTransaction();</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000000;">ft_rep</span>.replace(<span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">id</span>.<span style="color: #871094; font-style: italic;">frame_layout</span>, <span style="color: #0033b3;">new </span>MyFragment2());</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000000;">ft_rep</span>.commit();</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">// remove (X&oacute;a fragment hiện tại ra khỏi khung chứa)<br /></span><span style="color: #000000;">Fragment fragment </span>= <span style="color: #000000;">fm</span>.findFragmentById(<span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">id</span>.<span style="color: #871094; font-style: italic;">frame_layout</span>);</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000000;">FragmentTransaction ft_remo </span>= <span style="color: #000000;">fm</span>.beginTransaction();</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000000;">ft_remo</span>.remove(<span style="color: #000000;">fragment</span>);</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000000;">ft_remo</span>.commit();</span></pre> <h2 style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 30px 40px 15px 0px; padding: 10px 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 1.2em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: white; letter-spacing: 1px; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; background-color: #0e529f; text-align: center;">TRUYỀN DỮ LIỆU GIỮA C&Aacute;C FRAGMENT</h2> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">C&oacute; nhiều c&aacute;ch để truyền dữ liệu qua lại giữa hai đối tượng fragment. Trong phần n&agrave;y, ch&uacute;ng ta sẽ kh&aacute;m ph&aacute; d&ograve;ng di chuyển giữa c&aacute;c fragment như sau:</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;"><em><strong><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">FragmentA -&gt; Activity -&gt; FragmentB.&nbsp;</span></strong></em></span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Ở đ&acirc;y tại sao lại kh&ocirc;ng truyền trực tiếp từ FragmentA -&gt; FragmentB m&agrave; lại truyền v&ograve;ng qua Activity? Bởi v&igrave; c&aacute;c đối tượng fragment độc lập nhau v&agrave; cần m&ocirc;i trường chứa chung l&agrave; Activity, do đ&oacute; Activity l&agrave; cầu nối gi&uacute;p điều khiển c&aacute;c Fragment. Ch&uacute;ng ta sẽ giao tiếp trực tiếp giữa hai fragment m&agrave; th&ocirc;ng qua m&ocirc;i trường chung l&agrave; Activity</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Để hiểu r&otilde; hơn về c&aacute;ch truyền dữ liệu bằng interface ch&uacute;ng ta c&ugrave;ng đi v&agrave;o v&iacute; dụ dưới đ&acirc;y:</span></p> <p style="padding-left: 240px;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%2018.png?alt=media&amp;token=a0ccb3c2-e79d-496d-b98a-05988ad1bff8" alt="File preview" /></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Ứng dụng c&oacute; 2 Fragment xanh v&agrave; trắng, Fragment m&agrave;u xanh ở tr&ecirc;n sau khi nhập dữ liệu xong, bấm n&uacute;t send th&igrave; Fragment ở dưới sẽ nhận được dữ liệu v&agrave; hiển thị.&nbsp;</span>Tổng quan project ta c&oacute;:</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 240px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%2019.png?alt=media&amp;token=c1dacd64-906d-4776-a086-e1d0554cc9f4" alt="File preview" /></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;">Tạo interface <strong>DemoFragmentInterface</strong>.java</span></p> <pre style="color: #080808; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 10.5pt;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">package </span>com.funix.fragment;</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">public interface </span>DemoFragmentInterface {</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #0033b3;">void </span>sendData(String name, String age);</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">}</span></pre> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Trong class <strong>MainActivity</strong>.java</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Ở phương thức <strong>onCreate</strong> ta khai b&aacute;o 2 <strong>Fragment&nbsp;</strong> v&agrave; <em>implements class</em> <strong>DemoFragmentInterface</strong> v&agrave; triển khai phương thức <strong>sendData</strong> để gửi dữ liệu.</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Phương thức <strong>showInfor</strong> ta sẽ định nghĩa ở trong <strong>Fragment2</strong>.</span></p> <pre style="color: #080808; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 10.5pt;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">package </span><span style="color: #000000;">com.funix.fragment</span>;</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity</span>;</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">androidx.fragment.app.FragmentManager</span>;</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">androidx.fragment.app.FragmentTransaction</span>;</span><br /><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">android.os.Bundle</span>;</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">android.widget.Toast</span>;</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">public class </span><span style="color: #000000;">MainActivity </span><span style="color: #0033b3;">extends </span><span style="color: #000000;">AppCompatActivity </span><span style="color: #0033b3;">implements </span>DemoFragmentInterface {</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #9e880d;">@Override<br /></span><span style="color: #9e880d;"> </span><span style="color: #0033b3;">protected void </span><span style="color: #00627a;">onCreate</span>(<span style="color: #000000;">Bundle </span>savedInstanceState) {</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #0033b3;">super</span>.onCreate(savedInstanceState);</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> setContentView(<span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">layout</span>.<span style="color: #871094; font-style: italic;">activity_main</span>);</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #000000;">FragmentManager fragmentManager </span>= getSupportFragmentManager();</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #000000;">FragmentTransaction transaction </span>= <span style="color: #000000;">fragmentManager</span>.beginTransaction();</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> Fragment1 <span style="color: #000000;">fragment1 </span>= <span style="color: #0033b3;">new </span>Fragment1();</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #000000;">transaction</span>.add(<span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">id</span>.containerTop,<span style="color: #000000;">fragment1</span>);</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> Fragment2 <span style="color: #000000;">fragment2 </span>= <span style="color: #0033b3;">new </span>Fragment2();</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #000000;">transaction</span>.add(<span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">id</span>.containerBottom,<span style="color: #000000;">fragment2</span>);</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #000000;">transaction</span>.commit();</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> }</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #9e880d;">@Override<br /></span><span style="color: #9e880d;"> </span><span style="color: #0033b3;">public void </span><span style="color: #00627a;">sendData</span>(<span style="color: #000000;">String </span>name, <span style="color: #000000;">String </span>age) {</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> Fragment2 <span style="color: #000000;">fragment2 </span>= (Fragment2) getSupportFragmentManager().findFragmentById(<span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">id</span>.containerBottom);</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #0033b3;">if </span>(<span style="color: #000000;">fragment2 </span>!= <span style="color: #0033b3;">null </span>|| <span style="color: #000000;">fragment2</span>.isInLayout()){</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #000000;">fragment2</span>.showInfor(name,age);</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> }<span style="color: #0033b3;">else </span>{</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #000000;">Toast</span>.<span style="font-style: italic;">makeText</span>(getApplicationContext(),<span style="color: #067d17;">"???"</span>,<span style="color: #000000;">Toast</span>.<span style="color: #871094; font-style: italic;">LENGTH_LONG</span>).show();</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> }</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> }</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">}</span></pre> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Tại class <strong>Fragment1</strong>.java, ta thực thi đoạn chương tr&igrave;nh sau:</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Ở đ&acirc;y ch&uacute;ng ta khai b&aacute;o một biến interface d&ugrave;ng để lắng nghe thay đổi từ Fragment, khi người d&ugrave;ng nhập đầy đủ v&agrave; click button send, x&eacute;t sự kiện onClick khi click v&agrave;o n&uacute;t SEND.</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Override lại h&agrave;m onAttach để kiểm tra xem Activity hiện tại đ&atilde; implement c&aacute;i interface kia chưa. Tại đ&acirc;y, ta tiến h&agrave;nh g&aacute;n sự kiện cho biến interface đ&oacute;.</span></p> <pre style="color: #080808; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 10.5pt;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">package </span><span style="color: #000000;">com.funix.fragment</span>;</span><br /><br /><span </span><span style="color: #871094;">btnSend</span>;</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #0033b3;">private #9e880d;">@Override<br /></span><span style="color: #9e880d;"> </span><span style="color: #0033b3;">public void </span><span style="color: #00627a;">onAttach</span>(<span style="color: #000000;">Context </span>context) {</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #0033b3;">super</span>.onAttach(context);</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #0033b3;">if </span>(context <span style="color: #0033b3;">instanceof </span>MainActivity)</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #0033b3;">this</span>.<span style="color: #871094;">listener </span>= (DemoFragmentInterface) context;</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #0033b3;">else<br /></span><span style="color: #0033b3;"> throw new </span>RuntimeException(context.toString() + <span style="color: #067d17;">"must implement onViewSelected!"</span>);</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> }</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #9e880d;">@Nullable<br /></span><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #000000;">View view </span>= inflater.inflate(<span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">layout</span>.activity_fragment1,container,<span style="color: #0033b3;">false</span>);</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> }</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #9e880d;">@Override<br /></span><span style="color: #9e880d;"> </span><span style="color: #0033b3;">public void </span><span style="color: #00627a;">onClick</span>(<span style="color: #000000;">View </span>v) {</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #0033b3;">int </span><span style="color: #000000;">id </span>= v.getId();</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #0033b3;">switch </span>(<span style="color: #000000;">id</span>) {</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #0033b3;">case </span><span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">id</span>.btnSend:</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #000000;">String name </span>= <span style="color: #871094;">edtName</span>.getText().toString().trim();</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #000000;">String age </span>= <span style="color: #871094;">edtAge</span>.getText().toString().trim();</span><br /><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #0033b3;">if </span>(!<span style="color: #000000;">name</span>.equals(<span style="color: #067d17;">""</span>) &amp;&amp; !<span style="color: #000000;">age</span>.equals(<span style="color: #067d17;">""</span>)) {</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #871094;">listener</span>.sendData(<span style="color: #000000;">name</span>, <span style="color: #000000;">age</span>);</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> } <span style="color: #0033b3;">else if </span>(<span style="color: #000000;">name</span>.equals(<span style="color: #067d17;">""</span>)) {</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #871094;">edtName</span>.requestFocus();</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> } <span style="color: #0033b3;">else </span>{</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #871094;">edtAge</span>.requestFocus();</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> }</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="color: #0033b3;">break</span>;</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> }</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> }</span><br /><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">}</span></pre> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;">Tại class <strong>Fragment2</strong>.java</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; color: #000000;">Ở fragment n&agrave;y, ch&uacute;ng ta chỉ cần khai b&aacute;o phương thức showInfor() hiển thị dữ liệu cho n&oacute;.</span></p> <pre style="color: #080808; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 10.5pt;"><span style="color: #000000;">import androidx.annotation.NonNull;</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">import androidx.annotation.Nullable;</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;</span><br /><br /><span style="color: #000000;">import android.content.Context;</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">import android.os.Bundle;</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">import android.view.LayoutInflater;</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">import android.view.View;</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">import android.view.ViewGroup;</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">import android.widget.TextView;</span><br /><br /><span style="color: #000000;">public class Fragment2 extends Fragment {</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;"> private TextView tvName, tvAge;</span><br /><br /><span style="color: #000000;"> @Override<br /> public void onAttach(Context context) {</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;"> super.onAttach(context);</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;"> }</span><br /><br /><span style="color: #000000;"> @Nullable<br /> @Override<br /> public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;"> super.onCreateView(inflater,container,savedInstanceState);</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;"> View view = inflater.inflate(R.layout.activity_fragment2,container,false);</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;"> tvName = (TextView) view.findViewById(R.id.tvName);</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;"> tvAge = (TextView) view.findViewById(R.id.tvAge);</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;"> return view;</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;"> }</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;"> public void showInfor(String name, String age){</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;"> tvName.setText(name);</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;"> tvAge.setText(age);</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;"> }</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">}</span></pre> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong>Thiết kế giao diện cho c&aacute;c layout gồm:</strong></p> <ul> <li>activity_fragment1.xml</li> <li>activity_fragment2.xml</li> <li>activity_main.xml</li> </ul> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Layout&nbsp;</span><strong>activity_fragment1.xml</strong></p> <pre style="color: #080808; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 10.5pt;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-style: italic;">&lt;?</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">xml version</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="1.0" </span><span style="color: #174ad4;">encoding</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="utf-8"</span><span style="font-style: italic;">?&gt;<br /></span>&lt;<span style="color: #0033b3;">FrameLayout </span><span style="color: #174ad4;">xmlns:android</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #174ad4;">xmlns:app</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #174ad4;">xmlns:tools</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="http://schemas.android.com/tools"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: style="color: #067d17;">="match_parent"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #174ad4;">android:background</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="@color/colorPrimary"<br style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> &lt;<span style="color: #0033b3;">LinearLayout<br /></span><span style="color: #0033b3;"> </span><span style="color: #174ad4;">android:gravity</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="center"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #174ad4;">android:layout_gravity</span><span style="color: &lt;<span style="color: #0033b3;">EditText<br /></span><span style="color: #0033b3;"> </span><span style="color: #174ad4;">android:textSize</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="30dp"<br line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Bạn h&atilde;y ch&uacute; &yacute; bật phụ đề tiếng Việt được đ&oacute;ng g&oacute;p bởi FUNiX để hiểu r&otilde; hơn.</em></p> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@846dc23cd0dc43ee9af23f373a6c1cd3" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Exercise 3: Ứng dụng 12 cung hoàng đạo</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@846dc23cd0dc43ee9af23f373a6c1cd3" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@262f6872c20d41c0b6efd1d9046d93fb"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@262f6872c20d41c0b6efd1d9046d93fb" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;">B&agrave;i tập tự luyện:</strong></p> <p><strong>I. Phạm vi kiến thức vận dụng</strong></p> <p>- C&aacute;c kiến thức căn bản về Design UI&nbsp;</p> <ul> <ul> <li>Drawable, color, string, style&amp;theme</li> <li>Layout constraint rules (padding, margin&hellip;)</li> </ul> </ul> <p>- C&aacute;c đối tượng View System</p> <ul> <ul> <li>TextView, ImageView, Button</li> <li>C&aacute;c ViewGroup gồm: LinearLayout, FrameLayout, TableRow</li> </ul> </ul> <p>- Kiến thức nghi&ecirc;n cứu th&ecirc;m</p> <ul> <ul> <li>ConstraintLayout. Tham khảo <a href="https://developer.android.com/reference/android/support/constraint/ConstraintLayout" target="_blank">tại đ&acirc;y</a>.&nbsp;</li> </ul> </ul> <p>- T&agrave;i nguy&ecirc;n sử dụng:&nbsp;<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/18wU-5EYfwHOMh75MvfD-Ti3BwbVe5RCx/view" target="_blank">xem tại đ&acirc;y.</a></p> <p><strong>II. Nội dung b&agrave;i&nbsp;tập</strong></p> <p><strong>1. Y&ecirc;u cầu giao diện</strong></p> <p>Tạo 1 ứng dụng 12 cung ho&agrave;ng đạo v&agrave; x&acirc;y dựng giao diện layout sau:</p> <p>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; res/layout/m001_frg_menu.xml<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; res/layout/m002_frg_detail</p> <p style="padding-left: 180px;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%2021.png?alt=media&amp;token=e3de5d07-cd8e-40c5-bc7b-fbb993cacbc3" alt="File preview" /></p> <p><strong>M&ocirc; tả:</strong> Đ&acirc;y l&agrave; 2 giao diện hiển thị danh s&aacute;ch c&aacute;c cung ho&agrave;ng đạo v&agrave; chi tiết th&ocirc;ng tin của 1 cung ho&agrave;ng đạo</p> <p>- Kh&ocirc;ng c&oacute; ActionBar</p> <p>- Sử dụng ConstrainLayout để bố tr&iacute; c&aacute;c ImageView cung ho&agrave;ng đạo theo 1 cung tr&ograve;n</p> <p>- Sử dụng ScrollView để đựng khối TextView sao cho c&oacute; thể cuộn để xem nội dung text khi qu&aacute; d&agrave;i</p> <p><strong>2. Y&ecirc;u cầu logic</strong></p> <p>Sau khi đ&atilde; tạo được 2 layout như tr&ecirc;n. H&atilde;y thực hiện tạo 2 class activity sau để xử l&yacute; logic:</p> <p>a, Tại M001MenuActivity, set content cho n&oacute; quản l&yacute; layout m001_act_menu.xml</p> <p>- Xử l&yacute; click v&agrave;o c&aacute;c cung ho&agrave;ng đạo th&igrave;:</p> <ul> <ul> <li>Hiển thị ảnh cung ho&agrave;ng đạo tương ứng ở khối nội dung b&ecirc;n dưới</li> <li>Hiển thị t&ecirc;n cung tương ứng ở khối nội dung b&ecirc;n dưới</li> <li>Hiển thị nội dung cung tương ứng ở khối nội dung b&ecirc;n dưới</li> </ul> </ul> <p>- Xử l&yacute; click button Xem Th&ecirc;m để di chuyển sang m&agrave;n M002DetailActivity</p> <ul> <ul> <li>Gửi k&egrave;m c&aacute;c th&ocirc;ng tin gồm: Ảnh cung, t&ecirc;n cung, nội dung cung sang m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh mới bằng c&aacute;ch sử dụng Intent.</li> </ul> </ul> <p>b, Tại M002DetailActivity, set content cho n&oacute; quản l&yacute; layout m002_act_detail.xml</p> <ul> <ul> <li>Nhận dữ liệu của m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh M001 gửi sang, sau đ&oacute; set gi&aacute; trị cho c&aacute;c đối tượng View b&ecirc;n trong.</li> <li>Xử l&yacute; click v&agrave;o button Quay Lại để di chuyển về m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh trước đ&oacute;.</li> </ul> </ul> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@d53c9bc28c6f44ba994b70a44784e970" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Lab 4.1 - Tạo giao diện Toast Emoji</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@d53c9bc28c6f44ba994b70a44784e970" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@173eca34daa445589bb65e0fd4969579"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@173eca34daa445589bb65e0fd4969579" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><b style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; Phạm vi kiến thức vận dụng</span></b></p> <ul style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><b style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 17.12px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">C&aacute;c kiến thức căn bản về Design UI</span></b></li> </ul> <ul style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"> <ul style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Drawable</li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Color Schemes</li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">String constants</li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Style &amp; themes</li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Layout constraint rules (padding, margin&hellip;)</span></li> </ul> </ul> <ul style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><b style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 17.12px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">C&aacute;c đối tượng View System</span></b></li> </ul> <ul style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"> <ul style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">TextView, ImageView</span></li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">C&aacute;c ViewGroup gồm: LinearLayout, FrameLayout, TableRow</li> </ul> <li><strong>C&aacute;c đối tượng logic</strong></li> <ul style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Toast</li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Activity</li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Fragment</li> </ul> </ul> <p><strong><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">II. Nội dung b&agrave;i thực h&agrave;nh</span></strong></p> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;"><b>1. Y&ecirc;u cầu</b></span></p> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Tạo 1 ứng dụng Face Emoji v&agrave; x&acirc;y dựng giao diện layout sau:</span></p> <p style="padding-left: 300px;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%2022.png?alt=media&amp;token=7549c009-e869-44ae-8c61-2716faa865b9" alt="File preview" /></p> <p><strong>M&ocirc; tả:</strong>&nbsp;Đ&acirc;y l&agrave; 1 giao diện hiển thị danh s&aacute;ch c&aacute;c emoij vui nhộn, người d&ugrave;ng c&oacute; thể click v&agrave;o emoij bất kỳ để hiển thị l&ecirc;n m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh.</p> <p><strong>Y&ecirc;u cầu&nbsp;giao diện:</strong></p> <p>- Khối nội dung b&ecirc;n trong layout sẽ c&oacute; 1 khoảng c&aacute;ch với c&aacute;c cạnh của layout.</p> <p>- Phần ảnh của c&aacute;c emoij phải được bọc trong 1 background bo tr&ograve;n</p> <p>- C&oacute; 3 emoji tr&ecirc;n mỗi h&agrave;ng v&agrave; c&oacute; tổng cộng 3 h&agrave;ng</p> <p>- C&aacute;c emoji c&oacute; k&iacute;ch thước giống nhau</p> <p><strong>Y&ecirc;u cầu về logic:</strong></p> <p><strong>- Sử dụng Fragment để hiển thị giao diện</strong></p> <p>- Khi người d&ugrave;ng click v&agrave;o c&aacute;c emoji, sẽ <strong>toast</strong> l&ecirc;n icon emoji tương ứng ở g&oacute;c dưới của giao diện trong v&ograve;ng 1.5 gi&acirc;y sau đ&oacute; sẽ biến mất.</p> <p><strong>2. Gợi &yacute;</strong>: C&aacute;c kiến thức sử dụng</p> <p>- Tạo 1 layout <strong>xml</strong> trong thư mục res/layout</p> <p>- Sử dụng c&aacute;c ViewSystem:</p> <ul> <li>ImageView</li> </ul> <p>- Sử dụng c&aacute;c ViewGroup:</p> <ul> <li>LinearLayout hoặc FrameLayout</li> </ul> <p>- D&ugrave;ng drawable <strong>Shape</strong> để tạo 1 giao diện background bo g&oacute;c:</p> <p><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%2023.png?alt=media&amp;token=72429595-d3ee-4f93-8ab5-d915fbd6c425" alt="File preview" /></p> <p>Nội dung file:</p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="margin-left: 0.5in; border: none;"> <tbody> <tr> <td width="623" valign="top" style="width: 467.5pt; border-width: 1pt; border-color: windowtext; padding: 0in 5.4pt;"> <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><i><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">&lt;?</span></i><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: blue; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">xml version</span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: green; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">="1.0" </span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: blue; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">encoding</span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: green; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">="utf-8"</span><i><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: olive;">@Override<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">&gt;<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;</span><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">fragment<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">="@+id/frg_face_emoij"<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">="com.funix.demo.FragmentFaceEmoij"<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">MainActivity </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">super</span></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;
