}<br /> }<o:p></o:p></span></p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p><strong>4. Lưu &yacute;:</strong></p> <p>- C&aacute;c bạn ho&agrave;n to&agrave;n c&oacute; thể sử dụng layout ch&iacute;nh l&agrave; RelativeLayout để x&acirc;y dựng giao diện b&agrave;i n&agrave;y nh&eacute;.</p> <p>- Phương thức<strong> showToast</strong> gi&uacute;p hiển thị ảnh emoji l&ecirc;n thay v&igrave; 1 d&ograve;ng text th&ocirc;ng thường</p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Thời gian dự kiến ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh b&agrave;i n&agrave;y</strong>:&nbsp;<strong>30</strong><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">&nbsp;ph&uacute;t</strong></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><em style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Lưu &yacute;:</strong>&nbsp;Bạn h&atilde;y lưu kết quả lab tr&ecirc;n m&aacute;y t&iacute;nh c&aacute; nh&acirc;n để chuẩn bị cho buổi review sau n&agrave;y. Lưu &yacute; Học vi&ecirc;n cần ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh tất cả c&aacute;c b&agrave;i lab của m&ocirc;n học mới tiến h&agrave;nh đăng k&yacute; review.</em></p> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@d446766c49d244a1a7f46113985796a8" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Lab 4.2 - Xây dựng ứng dụng QuickCall Phần 1</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@d446766c49d244a1a7f46113985796a8" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@0dd80837de7f4313aae279efedc9bae9"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@0dd80837de7f4313aae279efedc9bae9" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">I. Phạm vi kiến thức vận dụng</span></b></span></p> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c kiến thức căn bản về Design UI </span></b></span></li> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Drawable</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Color Schemes</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">String constants</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Style &amp; themes</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Layout constraint rules (padding, margin&hellip;)</span></span></li> </ul> </ul> <p><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;"><span face="Symbol" style="font-family: Symbol;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;">&middot;</span></span><span face="Times New Roman" size="1" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: xx-small;">&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c đối tượng View System</span></b></span></p> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">TextView, ImageView</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c ViewGroup gồm:&nbsp;</span></span>LinearLayout, FrameLayout, TableRow</li> </ul> </ul> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">II. Nội dung b&agrave;i thực h&agrave;nh</span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">1. Y&ecirc;u cầu:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tạo 1 ứng dụng Quick Call v&agrave; x&acirc;y dựng giao diện layout sau</span></span></p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse: collapse; border: none; mso-yfti-tbllook: 1184; mso-padding-alt: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt; mso-border-insideh: none; mso-border-insidev: none;"> <tbody> <tr style="mso-yfti-irow: 0; mso-yfti-firstrow: yes; mso-yfti-lastrow: yes;"> <td width="252" valign="top" style="width: 189.0pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%2025.png?alt=media&amp;token=a60a5688-5e2c-45fc-9ad8-d75153de72fc" alt="File preview" /></td> <td width="371" valign="top" style="width: 278.5pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;"> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;">M&ocirc; tả:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Đ&acirc;y l&agrave; 1 giao diện hiển thị danh s&aacute;ch c&aacute;c danh bạ th&acirc;n quen v&agrave; thường xuy&ecirc;n li&ecirc;n lạc nhất của người d&ugrave;ng.</span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Y&ecirc;u cầu giao diện:</span></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;">-</span><span size="1" style="font-size: xx-small;">&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Custom thanh actionbar, g&oacute;c phải c&oacute; th&ecirc;m icon dialpad để người d&ugrave;ng nhập số điện thoại</span></span><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Khối nội dung b&ecirc;n trong layout sẽ c&oacute; 1 khoảng c&aacute;ch với c&aacute;c cạnh của layout.</span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Phần icon v&agrave; t&ecirc;n danh bạ phải được bọc trong 1 background bo tr&ograve;n</span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">C&aacute;c danh bạ nằm th&agrave;nh từng h&agrave;ng c&oacute; k&iacute;ch thước tương đương nhau.</span></span><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></span><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><o:p><span style="text-decoration: none;">&nbsp;</span></o:p></span></span></b></span></p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">2. Gợi &yacute;</span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">: </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c kiến thức sử dụng</span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tạo 1 layout <b>xml</b> trong thư mục res/layout</span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng c&aacute;c ViewSystem:</span></span></p> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">TextView</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">ImageView</span></span></li> </ul> </ul> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng c&aacute;c ViewGroup:</span></span></p> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">LinearLayout hoặc FrameLayout</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Thẻ include</span></span></li> </ul> </ul> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">D&ugrave;ng drawable <b>Shape</b> để tạo 1 giao diện background bo g&oacute;c</span></span></p> <p><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%2026.png?alt=media&amp;token=803d1afa-266f-4448-ad67-e967806a3df5" alt="File preview" /></p> <p><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">. Lưu &yacute;:</span></b></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c bạn ho&agrave;n to&agrave;n c&oacute; thể sử dụng layout ch&iacute;nh l&agrave; <b>RelativeLayout </b>để x&acirc;y dựng giao diện b&agrave;i n&agrave;y nh&eacute;.</span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng style </span><span style="line-height: 107%; color: green;"><span style="color: #000000;">Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.<b>NoActionBar</b> </span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">để ẩn actionbar của layout</span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng thẻ <b style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;">include</b> để th&ecirc;m actionbar cho layout main</span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Mỗi 1 item danh bạ View đ&atilde; được đ&iacute;nh k&egrave;m dữ liệu của 1 số điện thoại bằng thuộc t&iacute;nh </span><b style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">tag.</span><span style="mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Thời gian dự kiến ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh b&agrave;i n&agrave;y</strong>:&nbsp;<strong>30</strong><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">&nbsp;ph&uacute;t</strong></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><em style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Lưu &yacute;:</strong>&nbsp;Bạn h&atilde;y lưu kết quả lab tr&ecirc;n m&aacute;y t&iacute;nh c&aacute; nh&acirc;n để chuẩn bị cho buổi review sau n&agrave;y. Lưu &yacute; Học vi&ecirc;n cần ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh tất cả c&aacute;c b&agrave;i lab của m&ocirc;n học mới tiến h&agrave;nh đăng k&yacute; review.</em></p> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@ff831824252e48b099d9901b4c9d7cbe" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Lab 4.3 - Xây dựng ứng dụng QuickCall Phần 2</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@ff831824252e48b099d9901b4c9d7cbe" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@15021fcf40de47d9b5706649521b1e4f"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@15021fcf40de47d9b5706649521b1e4f" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">I. Phạm vi kiến thức vận dụng<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tiếp nối Lab&nbsp;4.2&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 10pt; line-height: 107%;">- </span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tạo giao diện Quick Call</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c kiến thức về logic:</span></span></li> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Activity</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">OnClickListener</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Intent</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">User permission: <a href=" https://developer.android.com/training/permissions/requesting" target="_blank">tại đ&acirc;y</a>.</span></span></li> </ul> </ul> </ul> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">II. Nội dung b&agrave;i thực h&agrave;nh<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">1. Y&ecirc;u cầu:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tạo 1 ứng dụng Quick Call đ&atilde; c&oacute; giao diện b&ecirc;n dưới v&agrave; xử l&yacute; logic sau.<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse: collapse; border: none; mso-yfti-tbllook: 1184; mso-padding-alt: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt; mso-border-insideh: none; mso-border-insidev: none;"> <tbody> <tr style="mso-yfti-irow: 0; mso-yfti-firstrow: yes; mso-yfti-lastrow: yes;"> <td width="252" valign="top" style="width: 189.0pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%205%2FH%C3%ACnh%2028.png?alt=media&amp;token=fae8572b-755c-4435-a73d-aea8190cdbed" alt="File preview" /></td> <td width="371" valign="top" style="width: 278.5pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;"> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;">M&ocirc; tả:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Đ&acirc;y l&agrave; 1 giao diện hiển thị danh s&aacute;ch c&aacute;c danh bạ th&acirc;n quen v&agrave; thường xuy&ecirc;n li&ecirc;n lạc nhất của người d&ugrave;ng.</span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><o:p></o:p></span></span><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Y&ecirc;u cầu logic:</span></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></span><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Người<span style="mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;"> d&ugrave;ng click v&agrave;o c&aacute;c item danh bạ để thực hiện cuộc gọi.</span></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><span style="mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;"><b><o:p></o:p></b></span></span></span><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Người d&ugrave;ng click v&agrave;o icon dialpad để mở m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh quay số điện thoại</span><b><o:p></o:p></b></span></p> <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; line-height: normal;"><b><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p> <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; line-height: normal;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><o:p><span style="text-decoration: none;">&nbsp;</span></o:p></span></span></b></p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">2. Gợi &yacute;</span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">: </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c kiến thức sử dụng<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tạo 1 layout <b>xml</b> trong thư mục res/layout<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng c&aacute;c ViewSystem:&nbsp;</span></span>TextView, ImageView</p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng c&aacute;c ViewGroup:<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">LinearLayout hoặc FrameLayout</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Thẻ include</span></span></li> </ul> </ul> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">2. Hướng dẫn triển khai code logic trong activity <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Bước 1:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> </span></b></span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;</span>Khai b&aacute;o quyền người d&ugrave;ng trong Android Manifest</span><o:p></o:p></span></p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse: collapse; border: none; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-yfti-tbllook: 1184; mso-padding-alt: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;"> <tbody> <tr style="mso-yfti-irow: 0; mso-yfti-firstrow: yes; mso-yfti-lastrow: yes;"> <td width="623" valign="top" style="width: 467.5pt; border: solid windowtext 1.0pt; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;"> <pre style="color: #000000; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 10.5pt;"><span style="font-style: italic;">&lt;?</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">xml version</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="1.0" </span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">encoding</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="utf-8"</span><span style="font-style: italic;">?&gt;<br /></span><span style="font-style: italic;"><br /></span>&lt;<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">manifest </span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">xmlns:</span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">package</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="com.funix.demo"</span>&gt;<br /> &lt;<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">uses-permission </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:name</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="android.permission.CALL_PHONE" </span>/&gt;<br /> &lt;<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">application<br /></span><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:allowBackup</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="true"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:icon</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="@drawable/ic_launcher"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:label</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="@string/app_name"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:supportsRtl</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="true"<br /></span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;"> </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:theme</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="@style/Theme.Demo"</span>&gt;<br /> &lt;<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">activity </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:name</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">=".MainActivity"</span>&gt;<br /> &lt;<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">intent-filter</span>&gt;<br /> &lt;<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">action </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:name</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="android.intent.action.MAIN" </span>/&gt;<br /> &lt;<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">category </span><span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="color: #0000ff; font-weight: bold;">:name</span><span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" </span>/&gt;<br /> &lt;/<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">intent-filter</span>&gt;<br /> &lt;/<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">activity</span>&gt;<br /> &lt;/<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">application</span>&gt;<br />&lt;/<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">manifest</span>&gt;</pre> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Bước 2:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;</span>Xử l&yacute; logic trong file MainActivity như sau:</span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">&Aacute;nh xạ c&aacute;c View trong layout ra m&ocirc;i trường code<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Xử l&yacute; click v&agrave;o c&aacute;c item Danh Bạ đồng thời kiểm tra quyền <b>thực hiện cuộc gọi </b>xem người d&ugrave;ng đ&atilde; cấp chưa<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp; </span></span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Xử l&yacute; click v&agrave;o icon dial để thực hiện mở m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh quay số điện thoại</span><o:p></o:p></span></p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="630" style="width: 472.25pt; border-collapse: collapse; border: none; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-yfti-tbllook: 1184; mso-padding-alt: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;"> <tbody> <tr style="mso-yfti-irow: 0; mso-yfti-firstrow: yes; mso-yfti-lastrow: yes;"> <td width="630" valign="top" style="width: 472.25pt; border: solid windowtext 1.0pt; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;"> <pre style="color: #000000; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 10.5pt;"><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">package </span>com.funix.demo;<br /><br /><br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>android.Manifest;<br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>android.app.AlertDialog;<br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>android.content.DialogInterface;<br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>android.content.Intent;<br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>android.content.pm.PackageManager;<br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>android.net.Uri;<br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>android.os.Bundle;<br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>android.view.View;<br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>android.view.animation.AnimationUtils;<br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>android.widget.FrameLayout;<br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>android.widget.Toast;<br /><br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;<br /><br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">public class </span>MainActivity <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">extends </span>AppCompatActivity <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">implements </span>View.OnClickListener {<br /> <span style="color: #808000;">@Override<br /></span><span style="color: #808000;"> </span><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">protected void </span>onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {<br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">super</span>.onCreate(savedInstanceState);<br /> setContentView(R.layout.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">activity_main</span>);<br /> initView();<br /> }<br /><br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">private void </span>initView() {<br /> findViewById(R.id.fr_mom).setOnClickListener(<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>);<br /> findViewById(R.id.fr_dad).setOnClickListener(<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>);<br /> findViewById(R.id.fr_crush).setOnClickListener(<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>);<br /> findViewById(R.id.fr_best_friend).setOnClickListener(<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>);<br /> findViewById(R.id.iv_dialer).setOnClickListener(<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>);<br /> }<br /><br /> <span style="color: #808000;">@Override<br /></span><span style="color: #808000;"><br /></span><span style="color: #808000;"> </span><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">public void </span>onClick(View v) {<br /> v.startAnimation(AnimationUtils.<span style="font-style: italic;">loadAnimation</span>(<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>, androidx.appcompat.R.anim.abc_popup_enter));<br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">if </span>(v <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">instanceof </span>FrameLayout) {<br /> processCall((String) v.getTag());<br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">return</span>;<br /> }<br /> <span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">//Hiển thị dialog th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o<br /></span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;"> </span>AlertDialog alert = <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">new </span>AlertDialog.Builder(<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>).create();<br /> alert.setTitle(<span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">"Th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o"</span>);<br /> alert.setMessage(<span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">"Mở m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh quay số?"</span>);<br /> alert.setButton(AlertDialog.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">BUTTON_POSITIVE</span>, <span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">"OK"</span>, <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">new </span>DialogInterface.OnClickListener() {<br /> <span style="color: #808000;">@Override<br /></span><span style="color: #808000;"> </span><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">public void </span>onClick(DialogInterface dialog, <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">int </span>which) {<br /> gotoDialPad();<br /> }<br /> });<br /> gotoDialPad();<br /> }<br /><br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">private void </span>gotoDialPad() {<br /> Intent intent = <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">new </span>Intent(Intent.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">ACTION_DIAL</span>);<br /> startActivity(intent);<br /> }<br /><br /><br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">private void </span>processCall(String phone) {<br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">if </span>(checkSelfPermission(Manifest.permission.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">CALL_PHONE</span>)<br /> != PackageManager.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">PERMISSION_GRANTED</span>) {<br /> requestPermissions(<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">new </span>String[]{Manifest.permission.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">CALL_PHONE</span>}, <span style="color: #0000ff;">101</span>);<br /> Toast.<span style="font-style: italic;">makeText</span>(<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>, <span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">"H&atilde;y thực hiện lại sau khi cấp quyền!"</span>, Toast.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">LENGTH_SHORT</span>).show();<br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">return</span>;<br /> }<br /><br /> Intent intent = <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">new </span>Intent(Intent.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">ACTION_CALL</span>);<br /> intent.setData(Uri.<span style="font-style: italic;">parse</span>(<span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">"tel: " </span>+ phone));<br /> startActivity(intent);<br /> }<br />}</pre> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b>4.</b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">&nbsp;Lưu &yacute;:</span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">-<span style="font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;</span></span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">C&acirc;u lệnh kiểm tra quyền người d&ugrave;ng xem đ&atilde; được cấp hay chưa:</span><b><o:p></o:p></b></span></p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="margin-left: .5in; border-collapse: collapse; border: none; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">if </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>!= PackageManager.</span><b><i><span style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; </span>requestPermissions(</span><b><span style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; </span>Toast.<i>makeText</i>(</span><b><span style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><o:p></o:p></span></b></p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst"><b><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; mso-add-space: auto; line-height: normal;"><span style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">Intent intent = </span><b><span style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">Intent(Intent.</span><b><i><span style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><o:p></o:p></span></b></p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst">- C&acirc;u lệnh để mở m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh quay số của ứng dụng Phone</p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="margin-left: .5in; mso-yfti-lastrow: yes; height: 30.1pt;"> <td width="575" valign="top" style="width: 431.5pt; border: solid windowtext 1.0pt; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt; height: 30.1pt;"> <p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt; mso-add-space: auto; line-height: normal;"><span style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">Intent intent = </span><b><span style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">new </span></b><span style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">Intent(Intent.</span><b><i><span style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">ACTION_DIAL</span></i></b><span style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">);<br /> startActivity(intent);</span><b><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><o:p></o:p></span></b></p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p class="MsoNormal"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Thời gian dự kiến ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh b&agrave;i n&agrave;y</strong><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">:&nbsp;</span><strong style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">30</strong><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">&nbsp;ph&uacute;t</strong></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><em style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Lưu &yacute;:</strong>&nbsp;Bạn h&atilde;y lưu kết quả lab tr&ecirc;n m&aacute;y t&iacute;nh c&aacute; nh&acirc;n để chuẩn bị cho buổi review sau n&agrave;y. Lưu &yacute; Học vi&ecirc;n cần ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh tất cả c&aacute;c b&agrave;i lab của m&ocirc;n học mới tiến h&agrave;nh đăng k&yacute; review.</em></p> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@bfe62e31bbfd4426ab65713759ef59bc" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Tổng kết bài học</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@bfe62e31bbfd4426ab65713759ef59bc" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@e426f3098f07438b99bc269bf7b38867"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@e426f3098f07438b99bc269bf7b38867" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p style="font-size: 16px;"><strong><span style="color: #0000ff;"><span style="color: #000000;">Tổng kết b&agrave;i học:</span>&nbsp;</span></strong></p> <p style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">B&agrave;i học cung cấp cho bạn c&aacute;c&nbsp;kiến thức n&acirc;ng cao về việc hiển thị giao diện th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o nhanh, cửa sổ th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o v&agrave; c&aacute;ch t&ugrave;y biến c&aacute;c layout giao diện trong m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh chức năng. Cụ thể, c&aacute;c kiến thức c&aacute;c bạn cần thực h&agrave;nh nhuần nhuyễn gồm C&Oacute;:</span></p> <ul> <li><span style="color: #000000;">Custom Toast (T&ugrave;y biến th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o nhanh): L&agrave; việc c&oacute; thể hiển thị nội dung th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o nhanh bằng c&aacute;c giao diện View do&nbsp;ch&iacute;nh bạn thiết kế</span></li> <li><span style="color: #000000;">Nắm vững 2 dạng Dialog v&agrave; &yacute; nghĩa cũng như c&aacute;ch sử dụng của ch&uacute;ng (AlertDialog v&agrave; Custom Dialog)</span></li> <li><span style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;ch sử dụng Fragment để quản l&yacute; c&aacute;c giao diện hiển thị</span></li> <li><span style="color: #000000;">2 c&aacute;ch nh&uacute;ng Fragment v&agrave;o m&ocirc;i trường Activity</span></li> <li><span style="color: #000000;">Trao đổi dữ liệu giữa c&aacute;c Fragment th&ocirc;ng qua m&ocirc;i trường Activity</span></li> </ul> <p style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">Một số t&agrave;i liệu để sinh vi&ecirc;n tham khảo th&ecirc;m:</span></p> <ul> <li><a href="https://www.howkteam.vn/Course/Android-Basics/Fragment-va-co-che-BackStack-99" target="[object Object]">Cơ chế back (quay lại m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh trước) trong Fragment</a></li> </ul> <p style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">Trong qu&aacute; tr&igrave;nh đọc t&agrave;i liệu c&oacute; bất cứ c&acirc;u hỏi n&agrave;o h&atilde;y kết nối với mentor.</span></p> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" &lt;div class=&#34;problem-progress&#34; id=&#34;block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@problem+block@aa3234624ac887a1d43f-problem-progress&#34;&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;problem&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;field&#34;&gt; &lt;label id=&#34;aa3234624ac887a1d43f_2_1-choice_0-label&#34; class=&#34;response-label field-label label-inline&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_aa3234624ac887a1d43f_2_1&#34;&gt; onCreate() &lt;/label&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;field&#34;&gt; &lt;label id=&#34;aa3234624ac887a1d43f_2_1-choice_1-label&#34; class=&#34;response-label field-label label-inline choicegroup_correct&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_aa3234624ac887a1d43f_2_1&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;radio&#34; name=&#34;input_aa3234624ac887a1d43f_2_1&#34; id=&#34;input_aa3234624ac887a1d43f_2_1_choice_1&#34; class=&#34;field-input input-radio&#34; value=&#34;choice_1&#34; checked=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; onAttach() &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_aa3234624ac887a1d43f_2_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;/label&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;field&#34;&gt; &lt;label id=&#34;aa3234624ac887a1d43f_2_1-choice_2-label&#34; class=&#34;response-label field-label label-inline&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_aa3234624ac887a1d43f_2_1&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;radio&#34; name=&#34;input_aa3234624ac887a1d43f_2_1&#34; id=&#34;input_aa3234624ac887a1d43f_2_1_choice_2&#34; class=&#34;field-input input-radio&#34; value=&#34;choice_2&#34;/&gt; onStart() &lt;/label&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;field&#34;&gt; &lt;label id=&#34;aa3234624ac887a1d43f_2_1-choice_3-label&#34; class=&#34;response-label field-label label-inline&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_aa3234624ac887a1d43f_2_1&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;radio&#34; name=&#34;input_aa3234624ac887a1d43f_2_1&#34; id=&#34;input_aa3234624ac887a1d43f_2_1_choice_3&#34; class=&#34;hint-button problem-action-btn btn-default btn-small&#34; data-value=&#34;Hint&#34; &gt;&lt;span class=&#34;icon fa fa-question&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;&gt;&lt;/span&gt;Hint&lt;/button&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;notification warning notification-gentle-alert is-hidden&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;icon fa fa-exclamation-circle&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;&gt;&lt;/span&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;notification-message&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;ce62a30c00ae728d8b5b-problem-title&#34;&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;notification-btn-wrapper&#34;&gt; &lt;button type=&#34;button&#34; class=&#34;btn btn-default btn-small notification-btn review-btn sr&#34;&gt;Review&lt;/button&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;notification warning notification-save is-hidden&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;icon fa fa-save&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;&gt;&lt;/span&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;notification-message&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;ce62a30c00ae728d8b5b-problem-title&#34;&gt;None &lt;/span&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;notification-btn-wrapper&#34;&gt; &lt;button type=&#34;button&#34; class=&#34;btn btn-default btn-small notification-btn review-btn sr&#34;&gt;Review&lt;/button&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; aria-describedby=&#34;ce62a30c00ae728d8b5b-problem-title&#34;&gt;Answers are displayed within the problem &lt;/span&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;notification-btn-wrapper&#34;&gt; &lt;button type=&#34;button&#34; class=&#34;btn btn-default btn-small notification-btn review-btn sr&#34;&gt;Review&lt;/button&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; " data-graded="True"> </div> </div> </div> <div class="vert vert-4" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@problem+block@ce210d6977122bf098c5"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-problem xmodule_display xmodule_CapaModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="problem" data-request-token="069f2ac2297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@problem+block@ce210d6977122bf098c5" data-type="Problem" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "Problem"} </script> <div id="problem_ce210d6977122bf098c5" class="problems-wrapper" role="group" aria-labelledby="ce210d6977122bf098c5-problem-title" data-problem-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@problem+block@ce210d6977122bf098c5" data-url="/courses/course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7/xblock/block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@problem+block@ce210d6977122bf098c5/handler/xmodule_handler" data-problem-score="1" data-problem-total-possible="1" data-attempts-used="1" data-content=" &lt;h3 class=&#34;hd hd-3 problem-header&#34; class=&#34;response-label field-label label-inline&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_ce210d6977122bf098c5_2_1&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;radio&#34; name=&#34;input_ce210d6977122bf098c5_2_1&#34; id=&#34;input_ce210d6977122bf098c5_2_1_choice_1&#34; class=&#34;field-input input-radio&#34; value=&#34;choice_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;pre&gt;include&lt;/pre&gt; &lt;/label&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;field&#34;&gt; &lt;label id=&#34;ce210d6977122bf098c5_2_1-choice_2-label&#34; class=&#34;response-label field-label label-inline choicegroup_correct&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_ce210d6977122bf098c5_2_1&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;radio&#34; name=&#34;input_ce210d6977122bf098c5_2_1&#34; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;action&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;hidden&#34; name=&#34;problem_id&#34; value=&#34;A164&#34; /&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;problem-hint&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;notification problem-hint notification-hint is-hidden&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;icon fa fa-question&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;&gt;&lt;/span&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;notification-message&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;ce210d6977122bf098c5-problem-title&#34;&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;notification-btn-wrapper&#34;&gt; &lt;button type=&#34;button&#34; class=&#34;btn btn-default btn-small notification-btn hint-button&#34;&gt; Next Hint &lt;/button&gt; &lt;button type=&#34;button&#34; class=&#34;btn btn-default btn-small notification-btn review-btn sr&#34;&gt;Review&lt;/button&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;submit-attempt-container&#34;&gt; &lt;button type=&#34;button&#34; class=&#34;submit btn-brand&#34; data-submitting=&#34;Submitting&#34; data-value=&#34;Submit&#34; data-should-enable-submit-button=&#34;True&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;submission_feedback_ce210d6977122bf098c5&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;ce210d6977122bf098c5-problem-title&#34;&gt;Answers are displayed within the problem &lt;/span&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;notification-btn-wrapper&#34;&gt; &lt;button type=&#34;button&#34; class=&#34;btn btn-default btn-small notification-btn review-btn sr&#34;&gt;Review&lt;/button&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; " data-graded="True"> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>

Lab 4.1 - Tạo giao diện Toast Emoji

I. Phạm vi kiến thức vận dụng

  • Các kiến thức căn bản về Design UI
    • Drawable
    • Color Schemes
    • String constants
    • Style & themes
    • Layout constraint rules (padding, margin…)
  • Các đối tượng View System
    • TextView, ImageView
    • Các ViewGroup gồm: LinearLayout, FrameLayout, TableRow
  • Các đối tượng logic
    • Toast
    • Activity
    • Fragment

II. Nội dung bài thực hành

1. Yêu cầu

Tạo 1 ứng dụng Face Emoji và xây dựng giao diện layout sau:

Mô tả: Đây là 1 giao diện hiển thị danh sách các emoij vui nhộn, người dùng có thể click vào emoij bất kỳ để hiển thị lên màn hình.

Yêu cầu giao diện:

- Khối nội dung bên trong layout sẽ có 1 khoảng cách với các cạnh của layout.

- Phần ảnh của các emoij phải được bọc trong 1 background bo tròn

- Có 3 emoji trên mỗi hàng và có tổng cộng 3 hàng

- Các emoji có kích thước giống nhau

Yêu cầu về logic:

- Sử dụng Fragment để hiển thị giao diện

- Khi người dùng click vào các emoji, sẽ toast lên icon emoji tương ứng ở góc dưới của giao diện trong vòng 1.5 giây sau đó sẽ biến mất.

2. Gợi ý: Các kiến thức sử dụng

- Tạo 1 layout xml trong thư mục res/layout

- Sử dụng các ViewSystem:

  • ImageView

- Sử dụng các ViewGroup:

  • LinearLayout hoặc FrameLayout

- Dùng drawable Shape để tạo 1 giao diện background bo góc:

Nội dung file:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<shape xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
    <solid android:color="#BFF9FF91" />
    <corners android:radius="20dp" />
</shape>

- Download các ảnh emoij và đưa vào trong thư mục drawable tại đây.

3. Hướng dẫn

Bước 1: Chuẩn bị tài nguyên drawable, color, string như sau:

Nội dung file res/values/colors.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<resources>
    <color name="purple_200">#FFBB86FC</color>
    <color name="purple_500">#FF9800</color>
    <color name="purple_700">#FF6F00</color>
    <color name="teal_200">#FF03DAC5</color>
    <color name="teal_700">#FF018786</color>
    <color name="black">#FF000000</color>
    <color name="white">#FFFFFFFF</color>
</resources>

Nội dung file res/values/strings.xml

<resources>
    <string name="app_name">Face Emoij</string>
</resources>

Bước 2: Tạo file res/layout/m001_frg_face_emoji.xml có nội dung sau:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<FrameLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:orientation="vertical">
    <ImageView
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"
        android:scaleType="centerCrop"
        android:src="@drawable/bg_emoij" />
    <LinearLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"
        android:background="#A6000000"
        android:orientation="vertical"
        android:paddingHorizontal="10dp"
        android:paddingTop="30dp">
 

       <TableRow
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:gravity="center">
            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/iv_face1"
                android:layout_width="100dp"
                android:layout_height="100dp"
                android:background="@drawable/bg_radius"
                android:padding="10dp"
                android:src="@drawable/ic_angry"
                tools:ignore="ContentDescription" />
            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/iv_face2"
                android:layout_width="100dp"
                android:layout_height="100dp"
                android:layout_marginStart="10dp"
                android:background="@drawable/bg_radius"
                android:padding="10dp"
                android:src="@drawable/ic_baffle"
                tools:ignore="ContentDescription" />
            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/iv_face3"
                android:layout_width="100dp"
                android:layout_height="100dp"
                android:layout_marginStart="10dp"
                android:background="@drawable/bg_radius"
                android:padding="10dp"
                android:src="@drawable/ic_beauty"
                tools:ignore="ContentDescription" />
        </TableRow>
       

        <TableRow
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
            android:gravity="center">
            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/iv_face4"
                android:layout_width="100dp"
                android:layout_height="100dp"
                android:background="@drawable/bg_radius"
                android:padding="10dp"
                android:src="@drawable/ic_boss"
                tools:ignore="ContentDescription" />
            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/iv_face5"
                android:layout_width="100dp"
                android:layout_height="100dp"
                android:layout_marginStart="10dp"
                android:background="@drawable/bg_radius"
                android:padding="10dp"
                android:src="@drawable/ic_choler"
                tools:ignore="ContentDescription" />
            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/iv_face6"
                android:layout_width="100dp"
                android:layout_height="100dp"
                android:layout_marginStart="10dp"
                android:background="@drawable/bg_radius"
                android:padding="10dp"
                android:src="@drawable/ic_dribble"
                tools:ignore="ContentDescription" />
        </TableRow>

        <TableRow
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
            android:gravity="center">
            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/iv_face7"
                android:layout_width="100dp"
                android:layout_height="100dp"
                android:background="@drawable/bg_radius"
                android:padding="10dp"
                android:src="@drawable/ic_look_down"
                tools:ignore="ContentDescription" />
            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/iv_face8"
                android:layout_width="100dp"
                android:layout_height="100dp"
                android:layout_marginStart="10dp"
                android:background="@drawable/bg_radius"
                android:padding="10dp"
                android:src="@drawable/ic_sure"
                tools:ignore="ContentDescription" />

            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/iv_face9"
                android:layout_width="100dp"
                android:layout_height="100dp"
                android:layout_marginStart="10dp"
                android:background="@drawable/bg_radius"
                android:padding="10dp"
                android:src="@drawable/ic_tire"
                tools:ignore="ContentDescription" />
        </TableRow>
    </LinearLayout>
</FrameLayout>

Bước 3: Triển khai code logic trong fragment FragmentFaceEmoij

package com.funix.demo;

import android.content.Context;
import android.graphics.drawable.Drawable;
import android.os.Bundle;
import android.view.LayoutInflater;
import android.view.View;
import android.view.ViewGroup;
import android.widget.ImageView;
import android.widget.Toast;

import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;

public class FragmentFaceEmoij extends Fragment implements View.OnClickListener {
    private static final int[] ids = {R.id.iv_face1, R.id.iv_face2, R.id.iv_face3, R.id.iv_face4,
            R.id.iv_face5, R.id.iv_face6, R.id.iv_face7, R.id.iv_face8, R.id.iv_face9};
    private Context mContext;

    @Override
    public View onCreateView(LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup container,

                                                                                                       Bundle savedInstanceState) {
        View rootView = inflater.inflate(R.layout.m001_frg_face_emoij, container, false);
        initViews(rootView);
        return rootView;
    }

    @Override
    public void onAttach(Context context) {
        mContext = context;
        super.onAttach(context);
    }

    private void initViews(View v) {
        for (int id : ids) {
            v.findViewById(id).setOnClickListener(this);
        }
    }

    @Override
    public void onClick(View v) {
        ImageView ivFace = (ImageView) v;
        showToast(ivFace.getDrawable());
    }

    private void showToast(Drawable drawable) {
        Toast toast = new Toast(mContext);
        ImageView ivEmoij = new ImageView(mContext);
        ivEmoij.setImageDrawable(drawable);
        toast.setView(ivEmoij);
        toast.show();
    }
}

 

Bước 4: Tạo file res/layout/activity_main.xml có nội dung sau:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<FrameLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:orientation="vertical">

    <fragment
        android:id="@+id/frg_face_emoij"
        class="com.funix.demo.FragmentFaceEmoij"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent" />
</FrameLayout>

Bước 5: Triển khai code logic trong activity MainActivity

package com.funix.demo;

import android.os.Bundle;
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;

public class MainActivity extends AppCompatActivity {

    @Override
    protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main);
    }
}

4. Lưu ý:

- Các bạn hoàn toàn có thể sử dụng layout chính là RelativeLayout để xây dựng giao diện bài này nhé.

- Phương thức showToast giúp hiển thị ảnh emoji lên thay vì 1 dòng text thông thường

Thời gian dự kiến hoàn thành bài này: 30 phút

Lưu ý: Bạn hãy lưu kết quả lab trên máy tính cá nhân để chuẩn bị cho buổi review sau này. Lưu ý Học viên cần hoàn thành tất cả các bài lab của môn học mới tiến hành đăng ký review.

Confirm , modal open

open

File ảnh: jpg,jpeg,png. Kích thước tối đa 5MB

Giải thích lỗi

Ảnh chụp lỗi

File ảnh: jpg,jpeg,png. Kích thước tối đa 5MB

Lỗi Ask Mentors

Trường hợp bạn gặp vấn đề với chức năng hỏi đáp mentor, vui lòng xem hướng dẫn dưới để xử lý:

A. Trường hợp đã gửi câu hỏi nhưng không tìm được mentor

  1. Vui lòng thử lại sau vài phút, hoặc thử vào giờ trực chính từ 8h-23h. Nếu không được, hãy sang bước 2.
  2. Nhắn hannah phụ trách để được hỗ trợ

B. Trường hợp không thấy mục Ask Mentors hoặc không thấy hiện ra đầy đủ nội dung nhập câu hỏi

  1. Vui lòng nhấn F5 sau vài phút. Nếu không được, hãy sang bước 2
  2. Nhắn hannah phụ trách để được hỗ trợ

Ask Mentors

Question now Hang your Question
